Action.title: (Dub) Afro Samurai Resurrection
Action.description: Afro Samurai found peace after avenging his father. But the master is forced back into the game by sexy Sio, a deadly woman from his past who won't quit until Afro pays for his sins. Starring Samuel L. Jackson and Lucy Liu.

Action.title: (Dub) Akira
Action.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Action.title: (Dub) Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
Action.description: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost, the prequel to best-selling Mass Effect 3, follows the early career of Alliance Marine, James Vega, as he leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against mysterious aliens known as The Collectors.

Action.title: (Dub) No Game, No Life: Zero
Action.description: Amid chaos and destruction, a young man named Riku leads humanity toward tomorrow. One day, in the ruins of an Elf city, he meets Shuvi, an exiled "Ex-machina" android who asks him to teach her what it means to have a human heart.

Action.title: (Dub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Action.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Action.title: (Sub) Akira
Action.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Action.title: (Sub) Fafner: Heaven and Earth
Action.description: A hiveminded alien force reengages war with Tatsumiya Island years after Kazuki led a team of mech pilots to destroy them. In an explosive battle over the fate of humankind, the young warriors risk everything to save their only home from assimilation.

Action.title: (Sub) K MISSING KINGS
Action.description: Ever since the School Island Incident, in which the four Kings were involved, the Silver Clansman, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko were on their search for their master Shiro.

Action.title: (Sub) Ninja Scroll
Action.description: When Jubei saves a young ninja woman from the unthinkable, he assumes that’s the end of it. To his surprise, it’s only just the beginning.

Action.title: (Sub) No Game, No Life: Zero
Action.description: Amid chaos and destruction, a young man named Riku leads humanity toward tomorrow. One day, in the ruins of an Elf city, he meets Shuvi, an exiled "Ex-machina" android who asks him to teach her what it means to have a human heart.

Action.title: (Sub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Action.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Action.title: (Sub) Trigun: Badlands Rumble
Action.description: Twenty years ago, Vash the Stampede allowed an infamous outlaw named Gasback to escape final justice. Now, on the streets of Macca City, Vash is about to learn a hard truth about consequences - and he might end up paying for the lesson with his life.

Action.title: 10.0 Earthquake
Action.description: Los Angeles is about to be hit by a devastating earthquake, and time is running out to save the city from imminent danger.

Action.title: The 12th Man
Action.description: Nazis hunt for a lone surviving saboteur in this edge-of-your-seat WWII thriller based on a true-life story. Jonathan Rhys-Meyers stars.

Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

Action.title: 3 Days to Kill
Action.description: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

Action.title: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
Action.description: When a snowstorm strands former professional hockey player Eric LeMarque (Josh Hartnett) atop the Sierra Nevada Mountains for eight days, he is forced to face his past and come to terms with his personal demons and rediscover the power of faith within him in order to survive.

Action.title: A.R.C.H.I.E. 2: Mission Impawsible
Action.description: In this outrageous family comedy-adventure, Michael J. Fox plays Archie, a flying, talking robot dog who becomes a big-top star when his owner runs away to join the circus.

Action.title: Abduction
Action.description: After uncovering a deadly lie, Nathan (Taylor Lautner) is propelled on a lethal, no-holds barred mission to learn the truth.

Action.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
Action.description: After a plane crash, siblings Ryan and Emma find themselves stranded in the Serengeti. Along with a dog named Chinook, they must work together to survive in the untamed wilderness.

Action.title: Air Strike
Action.description: Starring Bruce Willis and Adrien Brody and featuring thrilling dogfight action, this intense epic portrays China's brave battle to stop the Japanese bomber strikes of WWII.

Action.title: Along with the Gods: The Last 49 Days
Action.description: As the deceased soul Ja-hong and his three afterlife guardians prepare for their remaining trials for reincarnation, the guardians soon come face to face with the truth of their tragic time on Earth 1,000 years earlier.

Action.title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
Action.description: In this action-packed fantasy epic, a firefighter is taken to the afterlife by three guardians, where only after passing seven trials and proving he lived a noble life will he be able to reincarnate.

Action.title: American Ultra
Action.description: Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart star in this explosive action-adventure about a small-town slacker.

Action.title: Anthropoid
Action.description: Based  on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich’s third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

Action.title: Arcadia
Action.description: One man fights to give his family a future in a world crippled by disease where medical care is controlled by a totalitarian regime.

Action.title: The Archer
Action.description: A competitive archer is sent to a prison-like reform camp for girls but escapes with the help of a new friend.

Action.title: Assassination Nation
Action.description: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

Action.title: Backtrace
Action.description: Twenty years after a botched robbery, three grifters kidnap an amnesia patient to jog his memory and find the long-lost money.

Action.title: Barbie Presents: Thumbelina
Action.description: Barbie™ presents the story of Thumbelina, a tiny girl who saves the magical land of the Twillerbees™ and proves that even the smallest person can make a big difference!

Action.title: Black Spurs
Action.description: To turn a profit, cowboy turned bounty-hunter plots to ruin a Western town with gambling, loose women and renegades.

Action.title: Blade of the Immortal
Action.description: Manji, a highly skilled samurai, becomes cursed with immortality after a legendary battle. Haunted by the brutal murder of his sister, Manji knows that only fighting evil will regain his soul. The 100th film by master director Takashi Miike.

Action.title: Blood Diamond
Action.description: Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this action drama as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war

Action.title: Blue City
Action.description: After a five year absence, a young man returns home with the intent of reconciling with his father. When he learns that his father has been murdered, he seeks revenge.

Action.title: Blurt
Action.description: Nice guy Jeremy (Jace Norman) loses his ability to keep his thoughts to himself and can't help but say everything out loud. The only way to fix his problem will be the hardest thing he'll have to do: win the school election.

Action.title: Bullwhip
Action.description: An innocent man can escape hanging only by marrying a hot-tempered half-breed who brandishes a whip.

Action.title: Bumblebee
Action.description: Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken. When Charlie revives him, she quickly learns this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.

Action.title: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
Action.description: A sword-wielding stranger stalks a new breed of vampire across the European countryside.

Action.title: Cartels
Action.description: An elite team of DEA agents and a dangerous drug lord await extraction and find themselves trapped in an ambush!

Action.title: The Chaser
Action.description: In this gripping thriller, an ex-cop-turned-pimp must find a serial killer who is preying on call-girls and save the life of a woman who has gone missing.

Action.title: Chicken Run
Action.description: The creators of Wallace & Gromit bring you an exciting story about a group of chickens led by Rocky (Mel Gibson) who are determined to fly the coop–even if they can’t fly!

Action.title: The Colony
Action.description: Years ago, winter came and left. Survivors have tried to build a new society underground, but they soon learn the real danger is not from the ice and cold, but from their fellow survivors.

Action.title: The Commuter
Action.description: A man who gets caught up in a criminal conspiracy during his daily commute home and works against the clock to stop a deadly attack to save the lives of his fellow train passengers.

Action.title: Conan the Barbarian
Action.description: The tale of Conan the Cimmerian and his adventures across the continent of Hyboria on a quest to avenge the murder of his father and the slaughter of his village.

Action.title: Concrete Kids
Action.description: Two nine-year-old boys from Venice CA set off on a mission to cross Los Angeles on skateboards at night in an attempt to reach the Staples Center by 8am the next morning for a survival contest.

Action.title: Damascus Cover
Action.description: A man haunted by the death of his son must smuggle a chemical weapons scientist out of Syria. Within days his mission goes wrong. To survive, Ari reaches out to a deep cover agent and soon discovers that he is a pawn in a much bigger plan.

Action.title: Day of the Falcon
Action.description: After years of bloody conflict, the leaders of two rival kingdoms (Antonio Banderas and Mark Strong) reluctantly agree to peace.  But when oil is discovered in the land, war is re-ignited.

Action.title: Daylight's End
Action.description: A rogue drifter agrees to guide a band of survivors to sanctuary after a plague turns most of humanity into monsters.

Action.title: Death Wish
Action.description: A mild-mannered father is transformed into a killing machine after his family is torn apart by a violent act.

Action.title: Deck the Halls
Action.description: Based on the first book in Mary Higgins Clark and daughter Carol Higgins Clark's novels, this story brings together two of the authors' most popular characters: Cleaning-woman-turned-private-eye Alvirah, and Detective Reilly.

Action.title: The Domestics
Action.description: A survival love story! A young husband and wife must fight to return home in a post-apocalyptic mid-western landscape ravaged by gangs.

Action.title: The Eagle and the Hawk
Action.description: In 1863 two U.S. law enforcers discover a plot to overthrow Mexico's ruler and invade Texas. Lots of action and fabulous cinematography by James Wong Howe.

Action.title: El Camino Hacia El Dorado
Action.description: Al desembarcar en las playas de El Dorado, Tulio, Miguel son confundidos con dioses y son adorados con riquezas. Deben decidir entre huir con el oro o  salvar a los pobladores de El Dorado.

Action.title: Fallen
Action.description: Upon entering a mysterious reform school, Luce finds herself drawn into a love triangle and discovers her own love story that has been ongoing for centuries.

Action.title: The Family
Action.description: A mob family in the Witness Protection Program has trouble adjusting to a new home abroad.

Action.title: The French Connection
Action.description: Gene Hackman stars in this 1971 Best Picture Oscar(R) winner about a maverick cop who stops a huge heroin shipment into New York.

Action.title: The Fugitive
Action.description: Harrison Ford stars as a doctor accused of killing his wife who goes on the lam in search of the real culprit. Tommy Lee Jones co-stars.

Action.title: Fun Size
Action.description: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out.

Action.title: Gangster No. 1
Action.description: GANGSTER NO. 1 chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent and ruthless English gangster.

Action.title: Getaway
Action.description: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller.

Action.title: Gintama
Action.description: Set in the Edo shogunate where power of samurai is on decline as the aliens from outer space have invaded the country and outlawed their swords, it portrays the life of a handyman Gintoki Sakata, whom still carries the heart of a samurai.

Action.title: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
Action.description: In this hilarious, action packed western, three villains race to uncover a buried treasure fighting wild bandits, gangsters and each other along the way.

Action.title: Grace Jones: Bloodlight and Bami
Action.description: A larger-than-life entertainer, an androgynous glam-pop diva – Grace Jones is all these things and more. Sophie Fiennes’s documentary goes beyond the traditional music biography, offering a portrait as stylish and unconventional as its subject.

Action.title: Gridiron Gang
Action.description: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson (The Rundown, Walking Tall) stars in this gritty and inspirational movie, based on a true story about a group of teenage delinquents given a second chance to redeem themselves by playing football.

Action.title: Half-Shell Heroes: Blast to the Past
Action.description: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles find themselves on the adventure of a lifetime when they accidentally time travel back to the Jurassic Era! Rating: TV-Y7

Action.title: The Hangman
Action.description: A marshal goes after a man wanted for murder but finds himself pitted against an entire Western town.

Action.title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
Action.description: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

Action.title: Hot Guys with Guns
Action.description: Chinatown meets Boystown when an aspiring actor and a grizzled detective team up in this modern take on the old-fashioned detective story.

Action.title: Hotel Mumbai
Action.description: A gripping true story that recounts the siege of the Taj Hotel by terrorists in Mumbai. Refusing to leave their guests, hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

Action.title: I, Frankenstein
Action.description: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

Action.title: Innocent
Action.description: Bill Pullman (Independence Day, Torchwood) stars as Rusty Sabich, a judge charged with the murder of his wife, a situation that comes 20 years after he was cleared in the death of his mistress.

Action.title: Inside Out
Action.description: After being released from prison after serving 13 years, AJ's dreams of living a crime-free life soon come to an end when he discovers his childhood friend, Jack, has been marked for death.

Action.title: Into the Ashes
Action.description: After losing his wife, Nick must decide if he will stay on his new path or exact revenge and force his enemies to pay for what they have done.

Action.title: It Came from the Desert
Action.description: A pulpy monster movie inspired by the cult classic 1980s video game "It Came from the Desert," featuring rival motocross heroes and heroines, kegger parties in the desert, secret underground military bases...and of course giant ants!

Action.title: Jackass 3
Action.description: Johnny Knoxville and the rest of his friends (Bam Margera, Ryan Dunn, Steve-O) perform outrageous stunts and pranks.

Action.title: Johnny Guitar
Action.description: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

Action.title: Johnny Reno
Action.description: One man stands alone against the fury of mob justice. Threats. Fists. Bullets. Fire. By one means or another, riled-up folks at Stone Junction are going to have their way.

Action.title: Judgment Day
Action.description: An FBI agent and an ex-con hunt for a cult leader holding hostage a scientist whose asteroid-destroying weapon can save Earth.

Action.title: The Kid
Action.description: Vincent D'Onofrio directs this story of Rio, a young fan of Billy the Kid, who asks the fabled gunslinger to help him free his kidnappedsister, Sara, from his uncle's dastardly grip.

Action.title: Kill Order
Action.description: Uncanny abilities awaken within a troubled high school student when a fully-armed tactical team attempts to abduct him from his classroom.

Action.title: Killer Joe
Action.description: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

Action.title: Killers Anonymous
Action.description: Tensions mount at KILLERS ANONYMOUS, a support group for killers, as the members of the group try to unravel a mystery: Which one of them is responsible for the assassination attempt on a U.S. senator that has the police in the city on high alert?

Action.title: Knights of the Damned
Action.description: On assignment by the King to slay the dragon besieging his kingdom, a group of knights encounters an unstoppable army of the dead.

Action.title: The Last Airbender
Action.description: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

Action.title: The Last Days
Action.description: As a mysterious epidemic spreads across the planet trapping humanity indoors, one man sets off on a dangerous quest to save his missing girlfriend.

Action.title: The Last Man
Action.description: In this apocalyptic thriller, Hayden Christensen plays a vet suffering from PTSD who takes the advice of a street prophet (Harvey Keitel) and starts preparing for the end of days.

Action.title: The Last Stand
Action.description: After leaving the LAPD wracked with remorse and regret, Sheriff Ray Owens (Schwarzenegger) moved to a sleepy border town that now stands between Gabriel Cortez (Eduardo Noriega), the most notorious drug kingpin in the world and his freedom.

Action.title: The Last Warrior
Action.description: A 9.5-magnitude earthquake rocks Southern California, causing it to break off from the rest of the continent to form a desert island. The last warrior, Green Beret Nick Preston, leads a military patrol onto the devastated island to help the survivors.

Action.title: Law of the Lawless
Action.description: In Kansas during the 1880's, Clem Rogers known as the "hanging judge" arrives to try the son of the town's most influential man for murder. He refuses a bribe and is framed for a set-up crime.

Action.title: Lonely Man, The
Action.description: A gunfighter turns rancher at the mercy of a son who hates him and a gambler who wants to kill him.

Action.title: Lord of War
Action.description: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

Action.title: The Lovers
Action.description: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett.

Action.title: The Magic Hockey Skates
Action.description: Pint sized nine year old Joey has one dream - to be a Hockey Champion. Joey believes that brand new Rocky Rockets Skates will help him achieve his dream, but to his dismay his Father can only afford some beaten up second hand skates.

Action.title: A Man Alone
Action.description: Framed for a robbery, a gunman hides out in the home of the local sheriff and gradually wins his trust and respect. Now they must face the vengeful townspeople in a bloody war.

Action.title: Man on a Ledge
Action.description: While a man teetering on a 21st-floor ledge diverts attention, the world’s greatest diamond heist is underway.

Action.title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
Action.description: An American war hero who secretly assassinated Adolf Hitler has now been called upon to take out another global threat – Bigfoot.

Action.title: Maze
Action.description: Based on the incredible true story of the 1983 mass break-out of 38 IRA prisoners from the HMP Maze high security prison, one prisoner engineers the largest European prison escape since World War II.

Action.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: the Movie
Action.description: The powerless Rangers journey to a distant planet in search of a female warrior who can help them regain their strength.

Action.title: Missing Link
Action.description: "Missing Link" is a globe-trotting comedy-adventure about a dashing investigator of myths and monsters (Hugh Jackman) and the surprisingly silly and soulful beast he discovers (Zach Galifianakis).

Action.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
Action.description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions.

Action.title: The Monkey King 3
Action.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Action.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
Action.description: A nearly 50-foot tall woman leads a gaggle of other 1950s throwback monsters into battle against an alien menace in this animated comedy.

Action.title: Mortdecai
Action.description: Depp, Paltrow, and McGregor star in this globe-trotting comedy about an unlikely team recruited to find a stolen, priceless painting.

Action.title: Mud
Action.description: After two boys discover a mysterious outlaw named Mud hiding on a deserted island in the Mississippi River, they embark on a dangerous, life-changing odyssey to reunite Mud with his long-lost love.

Action.title: The Next Three Days
Action.description: John Brennan will stop at nothing to protect his family, but he's never had to put his life and others' on the line. When his wife is convicted of murder, and all appeals efforts are exhausted, the only hope he sees is breaking her out.

Action.title: No Holds Barred
Action.description: When world wrestling champion Rip Thomas (Hulk Hogan) refuses to join a competing network, an evil executive creates a new program, "The Battle of the Tough Guys," where rules don't exist and men engage in an all-out brawl for money.

Action.title: No Way Out (Sin Salida)
Action.description: A former undercover cop (Hector Echavarria) who lost his family and heath to the retribution of a drug cartel tries to start over again, but his past won't stay buried.

Action.title: The Numbers Station
Action.description: A black ops agent (John Cusack) and a code operator (Malin Akerman) in a remote CIA broadcast station find themselves in a life-or-death struggle to stop a deadly plot before it's too late.

Action.title: Once Upon a Time in Venice
Action.description: When Steve Ford's (Bruce Willis) beloved dog, Buddy, is stolen by local thugs, he makes a questionable alliance with their devious leader, Spyder (Jason Momoa) in order to set things straight and get Buddy back where he belongs.

Action.title: The Osiris Child
Action.description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

Action.title: Overdrive
Action.description: Scott Eastwood stars in this action-adventure from the writers of 2 Fast 2 Furious and the director of Taken. When two legendary car thieves are caught stealing from a mafia boss, they are given a week to nab a vintage Ferrari, or risk losing everything.

Action.title: Overlord
Action.description: D-Day invasion finds two paratroopers caught behind enemy lines fighting Nazis and supernatural forces, resulting from a secret Nazi experiment.

Action.title: The Pagan King
Action.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

Action.title: Pilgrimage
Action.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

Action.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
Action.description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

Action.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
Action.description: The Soul-Heart Calls…

Action.title: Pony Express
Action.description: In 1860, Buffalo Bill Cody and Wild Bill Hickok are sent to establish a Pony Express service across California.

Action.title: The Prince
Action.description: A former assassin is unwittingly drawn back into the life he gave up when he suspects that his daughter has been kidnapped.

Action.title: The Princess of Montpensier
Action.description: The life of a ravishing young princess is torn apart by lust and forbidden desire, in this epic period drama.

Action.title: The Quake
Action.description: From the people that brought you the hit thriller The Wave, this action spectacular forewarns a new catastrophic disaster when the city of Oslo is threatened by a devastating earthquake. Norwegian with English subtitles.

Action.title: Radioflash
Action.description: In the aftermath of an apocalyptic power outage, a young woman encounters the horrors awaiting her in the darkness as she tries to reunite her family and fight for survival.

Action.title: Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale
Action.description: In this darkly comic gem, it's Christmas Eve in northern Finland, and an archeological dig has just unearthed Santa Claus. But this Santa isn't one you want coming to town.

Action.title: Raze
Action.description: Abducted women are forced to fight to the death in an ancient ceremony.

Action.title: The Reunion
Action.description: After the death of her father, a daughter fulfills his last wish and finds a way to bring her three brothers back together.

Action.title: Richard the Lionheart
Action.description: The legend of Richard the Lionheart is born as Richard battles an unending onslaught of challengers in order to survive the hellish prison he's been stranded in.

Action.title: Righteous Kill
Action.description: Two veteran New York City detectives (Academy Award-winners Robert De Niro and Al Pacino) hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

Action.title: The Road to El Dorado
Action.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Action.title: Robin Hood
Action.description: The Swashbuckling legend of Robin Hood unfolds in the 12th century when the mighty Normans ruled England with an iron fist.

Action.title: Running with the Devil
Action.description: When a cocaine shipment is compromised, a drug cartel’s CEO, known as The Boss orders his most trusted henchman, The Cook, and his partner, another master drug trafficker known as The Man, on a dangerous journey to audit the company’s supply chain.

Action.title: Santee
Action.description: A lethal bounty hunter seeks to avenge his son's death - if the son of one of his victims lets him live long enough.

Action.title: A Score to Settle
Action.description: With only a short time to live, Frankie Carver is released from prison, vowing to track down every last member of the gang that betrayed him.

Action.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Action.description: Sinbad the sailor must retrieve the stolen Book of Peace from a goddess with a penchant for chaos in this mythological animated tale.

Action.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Action.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

Action.title: The Spy Next Door
Action.description: Jackie Chan is a former superspy who wants to settle down with his girlfriend, but first has to battle Russian terrorists.

Action.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
Action.description: After being dumped by her boyfriend who is a spy, a woman and her friend become embroiled in a conspiracy.

Action.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Action.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Action.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Action.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Action.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Action.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Action.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Action.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

Action.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
Action.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

Action.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Action.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

Action.title: Stung
Action.description: A swanky garden party turns into a nightmare when giant killer wasps attack in this blood-splattered horror comedy.

Action.title: Super
Action.description: When sad-sack loser Frank (Rainn Wilson) sees his ex-addict wife (Liv Tyler) willingly snatched by a seductive drug dealer (Kevin Bacon), he finds himself bereft and wholly unable to cope. But soon he decides to fight back under the guise of a DIY superhero called Crimson Bolt. With a hand-made suit, a wrench, and a crazed sidekick named Boltie (Ellen Page), the Crimson Bolt beats his way through the mean streets of crime in hopes of saving his wife.  The rules were written a long time ago: You are not supposed to molest children, cut lines or key cars; if you do, prepare to face the wrath of the Crimson Bolt!

Action.title: Tangerines
Action.description: During the growing conflict between separatists in the wake of the Soviet Union's break-up, two immigrant farmers make the dangerous decision to remain in a war torn area long enough to harvest their tangerine crop.

Action.title: A Taxi Driver
Action.description: In this powerful drama based on a true story, a down-on-his-luck taxi driver hired by a foreign journalist finds himself in a life-or-death struggle in the midst of the Gwangju Uprising.

Action.title: Tetsuo: The Bullet Man
Action.description: Calm office worker Anthony, son of an American father and a Japanese mother, lives in Tokyo with his wife Yuriko and their little son Tom. Since Anthony’s mother died of cancer, his scientist father has been overly fearful for their health and rigidly subjects Anthony and Tom to monthly physicals. Walking home, Tom is killed in a hit and run before Anthony’s eyes. Losing their boy pushes Yuriko over the edge and triggers violent emotions in Anthony, whose body begins to transform. Little by little, his cells turn into iron. When the driver who killed Tom reappears and Anthony learns the truth about his father’s past experiments on human guinea pigs and about his mother’s death, Anthony mutates into a mass of metal, a human weapon fuelled by an uncontrollable rage.

Action.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
Action.description: A young constable discovers a secret society whose members use supernatural powers to protect mankind. They must soon band together to battle an ancient creature that threatens to destroy the world.

Action.title: Tiny Toon Adventures: Night Ghoulery
Action.description: A framework that's more than slightly similar to Rod Serling's "Night Gallery" and several other tales of horror and hilarity with a typical Tiny Toons twist.

Action.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Action.description: When Apollo 11 landed the Moon in 1969, the government discovered an alien spacecraft with technology it kept secret from the Autobots. Presented by FXM

Action.title: True Grit
Action.description: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer.

Action.title: The Villainess
Action.description: Bloody revenge is at the heart of this stylish action-thriller that doses the classic femme fatale story with a shot of adrenaline as it follows a former assassin who will stop at nothing to cut ties to her past.

Action.title: Walking With the Enemy
Action.description: During World War II, a young Hungarian (Jonas Armstrong) disguises himself as a Nazi officer to save his family and thousands of his countrymen from the death camps. Meanwhile, Hungary's regent (Ben Kingsley) takes great risks to save his country.

Action.title: Warpath
Action.description: Action-packed Western film involving O'Brien's hunt for the outlaws who murdered his girlfriend.

Action.title: Warrior
Action.description: WARRIOR tells the inspirational story of an estranged family that finds redemption in the unlikeliest of places-the MMA ring.

Action.title: The Wave
Action.description: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

Action.title: The Way Back
Action.description: Four-time Oscar nominee Ed Harris, Jim Sturgess and Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Colin Farrell star in this epic saga of survival from six-time Oscar-nominee Peter Weir. Inspired by an incredible true story.

Action.title: We Die Young
Action.description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

Action.title: Wild Card
Action.description: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss

Action.title: Wolf Warrior 2
Action.description: China's deadliest special forces operative settles into a quiet life on the sea. When sadistic mercenaries begin targeting nearby civilians, he must leave his newfound peace behind and return to his duties as a soldier and protector.

Action.title: Woman at War
Action.description: Halla declares a one-woman-war on the local aluminum industry. But as she prepares to abandon her role as environmental activist to become a mother, she decides to plot one final attack to deal the aluminum industry a crippling blow.

Adult Animation.title: (Dub) Afro Samurai Resurrection
Adult Animation.description: Afro Samurai found peace after avenging his father. But the master is forced back into the game by sexy Sio, a deadly woman from his past who won't quit until Afro pays for his sins. Starring Samuel L. Jackson and Lucy Liu.

Adult Animation.title: (Dub) Akira
Adult Animation.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Adult Animation.title: (Sub) Akira
Adult Animation.description: Clandestine army activities threaten the war torn city of Neo-Tokyo when a mysterious child with powerful psychic abilities escapes his prison and inadvertently draws a violent motorcycle gang into a heinous web of experimentation.

Adult Animation.title: (Sub) Ninja Scroll
Adult Animation.description: When Jubei saves a young ninja woman from the unthinkable, he assumes that’s the end of it. To his surprise, it’s only just the beginning.

Adult Animation.title: Loving Vincent
Adult Animation.description: Mystery surrounds the death of famed painter Vincent van Gogh in 1890 France.

Adventure.title: (Dub) Afro Samurai Resurrection
Adventure.description: Afro Samurai found peace after avenging his father. But the master is forced back into the game by sexy Sio, a deadly woman from his past who won't quit until Afro pays for his sins. Starring Samuel L. Jackson and Lucy Liu.

Adventure.title: (Dub) Mass Effect: Paragon Lost
Adventure.description: Mass Effect: Paragon Lost, the prequel to best-selling Mass Effect 3, follows the early career of Alliance Marine, James Vega, as he leads an elite Special Forces squad into battle against mysterious aliens known as The Collectors.

Adventure.title: (Dub) No Game, No Life: Zero
Adventure.description: Amid chaos and destruction, a young man named Riku leads humanity toward tomorrow. One day, in the ruins of an Elf city, he meets Shuvi, an exiled "Ex-machina" android who asks him to teach her what it means to have a human heart.

Adventure.title: (Dub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Adventure.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Adventure.title: (Sub) Fafner: Heaven and Earth
Adventure.description: A hiveminded alien force reengages war with Tatsumiya Island years after Kazuki led a team of mech pilots to destroy them. In an explosive battle over the fate of humankind, the young warriors risk everything to save their only home from assimilation.

Adventure.title: (Sub) K MISSING KINGS
Adventure.description: Ever since the School Island Incident, in which the four Kings were involved, the Silver Clansman, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko were on their search for their master Shiro.

Adventure.title: (Sub) Ninja Scroll
Adventure.description: When Jubei saves a young ninja woman from the unthinkable, he assumes that’s the end of it. To his surprise, it’s only just the beginning.

Adventure.title: (Sub) No Game, No Life: Zero
Adventure.description: Amid chaos and destruction, a young man named Riku leads humanity toward tomorrow. One day, in the ruins of an Elf city, he meets Shuvi, an exiled "Ex-machina" android who asks him to teach her what it means to have a human heart.

Adventure.title: (Sub) Sword Art Online: The Movie - Ordinal Scale
Adventure.description: Two years after the SAO incident, a new Augmented-Reality MMO, Ordinal Scale, has become an instant hit. As Kirito and Asuna explore, they soon realize that the line between the virtual world and reality is blurring, and it isn't all fun and games.

Adventure.title: (Sub) Trigun: Badlands Rumble
Adventure.description: Twenty years ago, Vash the Stampede allowed an infamous outlaw named Gasback to escape final justice. Now, on the streets of Macca City, Vash is about to learn a hard truth about consequences - and he might end up paying for the lesson with his life.

Adventure.title: 10.0 Earthquake
Adventure.description: Los Angeles is about to be hit by a devastating earthquake, and time is running out to save the city from imminent danger.

Adventure.title: The 12th Man
Adventure.description: Nazis hunt for a lone surviving saboteur in this edge-of-your-seat WWII thriller based on a true-life story. Jonathan Rhys-Meyers stars.

Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

Adventure.title: 3 Days to Kill
Adventure.description: A dying CIA agent trying to reconnect with his estranged daughter is offered an experimental drug that could save his life in exchange for one last assignment.

Adventure.title: 6 Below: Miracle on the Mountain
Adventure.description: When a snowstorm strands former professional hockey player Eric LeMarque (Josh Hartnett) atop the Sierra Nevada Mountains for eight days, he is forced to face his past and come to terms with his personal demons and rediscover the power of faith within him in order to survive.

Adventure.title: A.R.C.H.I.E. 2: Mission Impawsible
Adventure.description: In this outrageous family comedy-adventure, Michael J. Fox plays Archie, a flying, talking robot dog who becomes a big-top star when his owner runs away to join the circus.

Adventure.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
Adventure.description: After a plane crash, siblings Ryan and Emma find themselves stranded in the Serengeti. Along with a dog named Chinook, they must work together to survive in the untamed wilderness.

Adventure.title: Air Strike
Adventure.description: Starring Bruce Willis and Adrien Brody and featuring thrilling dogfight action, this intense epic portrays China's brave battle to stop the Japanese bomber strikes of WWII.

Adventure.title: Along with the Gods: The Last 49 Days
Adventure.description: As the deceased soul Ja-hong and his three afterlife guardians prepare for their remaining trials for reincarnation, the guardians soon come face to face with the truth of their tragic time on Earth 1,000 years earlier.

Adventure.title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
Adventure.description: In this action-packed fantasy epic, a firefighter is taken to the afterlife by three guardians, where only after passing seven trials and proving he lived a noble life will he be able to reincarnate.

Adventure.title: Animaniacs: Wakko’s Wish
Adventure.description: Wakko picks the only magical falling star capable of granting his wish, but the entire Animaniac clan must battle its way across a vast snowy country and outrace the evil King Salazar to reach the star and get his wish.

Adventure.title: Annihilation
Adventure.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition where the laws of nature don't apply.

Adventure.title: Another Time
Adventure.description: The top investment manager at his firm is assigned to help the stunning owner of a recently acquired company. He realizes he has fallen for her, and he has to go back in time to meet her before she becomes engaged.

Adventure.title: Anthropoid
Adventure.description: Based  on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich’s third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

Adventure.title: Antz
Adventure.description: A small worker ant switch places with a soldier ant to win the heart of the beautiful princess. A comedy-adventure featuring Sharon Stone, Sylvester Stallone and Woody Allen.

Adventure.title: Backtrace
Adventure.description: Twenty years after a botched robbery, three grifters kidnap an amnesia patient to jog his memory and find the long-lost money.

Adventure.title: Bad Company
Adventure.description: Adventurous tale of two young drifters who wildly rob their way West during the Civil War.

Adventure.title: Barbie & Her Sisters in The Great Puppy Adventure
Adventure.description: Barbie™, her sisters, and their adorable new puppy pals find unexpected mystery and adventure while searching for long-lost treasure in their hometown of Willows.

Adventure.title: Barbie and the Diamond Castle
Adventure.description: In this animated movie, Barbie (Kelly Sheridan) wants to teach her little sister, Stacie (Chantal Strand), the true value of friendship. So she and her best friend, Teresa (Cassidy Ladden), weave a music-infused fairy tale about Liana and Alexa, two peasant girls who have little else but each other and their love of song. When a magic mirror reveals an evil plan to destroy the Diamond Castle and end all music worldwide, Liana and Alexa bravely set out to save the day.

Adventure.title: Barbie in a Mermaid Tale 2
Adventure.description: Surf’s up for Barbie™ as she returns as Merliah™, the surfing champ who’s also a mermaid princess, in this new sea-quel™ where she learns anything is possible when you stay true to yourself!

Adventure.title: Barbie Presents: Thumbelina
Adventure.description: Barbie™ presents the story of Thumbelina, a tiny girl who saves the magical land of the Twillerbees™ and proves that even the smallest person can make a big difference!

Adventure.title: Barbie: A Fashion Fairytale
Adventure.description: Fired from her most recent acting job, Barbie gets even more bad news when her longtime boyfriend, Ken, rudely breaks up with her over the phone. To mend her broken heart, Barbie visits her fashion-designer aunt Millicent in Paris, but her aunt has her own problems: To the delight of her longtime rival, Jacqueline, Millicent's design firm has gone broke. However, her assistant, Marie-Alecia, has a plan, and, with the help of some magical fashion fairies, she and Barbie try to save the day.

Adventure.title: Barbie: A Perfect Christmas
Adventure.description: Join Barbie™ and her sisters in this heartwarming, musical adventure where they discover what truly makes A Perfect Christmas – being together!

Adventure.title: Barbie: Mariposa & her Butterfly Fairy Friends
Adventure.description: Join Barbie™ in an all-new world of Butterfly Fairies! When the Queen falls ill, it's up to brave Mariposa™ and her friends to journey beyond the safe borders of the city to find a cure.

Adventure.title: Barbie: The Pearl Princess
Adventure.description: Join Lumina, the Mermaid princess, and her best friend Kuda, a pink sea horse, as she calls on her magical pearl powers for an unforgettable adventure in a beautiful mermaid world!

Adventure.title: Black Spurs
Adventure.description: To turn a profit, cowboy turned bounty-hunter plots to ruin a Western town with gambling, loose women and renegades.

Adventure.title: Blade of the Immortal
Adventure.description: Manji, a highly skilled samurai, becomes cursed with immortality after a legendary battle. Haunted by the brutal murder of his sister, Manji knows that only fighting evil will regain his soul. The 100th film by master director Takashi Miike.

Adventure.title: Blood Diamond
Adventure.description: Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this action drama as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war

Adventure.title: Blue City
Adventure.description: After a five year absence, a young man returns home with the intent of reconciling with his father. When he learns that his father has been murdered, he seeks revenge.

Adventure.title: Bullwhip
Adventure.description: An innocent man can escape hanging only by marrying a hot-tempered half-breed who brandishes a whip.

Adventure.title: Bumblebee
Adventure.description: Charlie, on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken. When Charlie revives him, she quickly learns this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.

Adventure.title: Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter
Adventure.description: A sword-wielding stranger stalks a new breed of vampire across the European countryside.

Adventure.title: Chicken Run
Adventure.description: The creators of Wallace & Gromit bring you an exciting story about a group of chickens led by Rocky (Mel Gibson) who are determined to fly the coop–even if they can’t fly!

Adventure.title: The Colony
Adventure.description: Years ago, winter came and left. Survivors have tried to build a new society underground, but they soon learn the real danger is not from the ice and cold, but from their fellow survivors.

Adventure.title: Conan the Barbarian
Adventure.description: The tale of Conan the Cimmerian and his adventures across the continent of Hyboria on a quest to avenge the murder of his father and the slaughter of his village.

Adventure.title: Concrete Kids
Adventure.description: Two nine-year-old boys from Venice CA set off on a mission to cross Los Angeles on skateboards at night in an attempt to reach the Staples Center by 8am the next morning for a survival contest.

Adventure.title: Curious George
Adventure.description: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

Adventure.title: Curious George 2: Follow That Monkey!
Adventure.description: The world’s most beloved and inquisitive monkey is back in Curious George 2: Follow That Monkey, the fun-filled sequel to the hit animated movie.

Adventure.title: Curious George 3: Back to the Jungle
Adventure.description: Curious George goes on an epic adventure to space that crash lands in the jungles of Africa leading to an unforgettable journey with some new animal friends.

Adventure.title: Curious George: Royal Monkey
Adventure.description: Join your favorite monkey as he takes on his most regal role yet, trading places with a royal monkey!

Adventure.title: Damascus Cover
Adventure.description: A man haunted by the death of his son must smuggle a chemical weapons scientist out of Syria. Within days his mission goes wrong. To survive, Ari reaches out to a deep cover agent and soon discovers that he is a pawn in a much bigger plan.

Adventure.title: Daphne & Velma
Adventure.description: Daphne and Velma, two mystery-solving teens, investigate what is causing some of the brightest students at their high school to become "zombie-fied."

Adventure.title: Day of the Falcon
Adventure.description: After years of bloody conflict, the leaders of two rival kingdoms (Antonio Banderas and Mark Strong) reluctantly agree to peace.  But when oil is discovered in the land, war is re-ignited.

Adventure.title: The Day Shall Come
Adventure.description: A revolutionist becomes the target of an overzealous FBI agent's desperate ploy to expose terrorism in this hilarious farce about homeland insecurities. Anna Kendrick co-stars.

Adventure.title: Daylight's End
Adventure.description: A rogue drifter agrees to guide a band of survivors to sanctuary after a plague turns most of humanity into monsters.

Adventure.title: Deck the Halls
Adventure.description: Based on the first book in Mary Higgins Clark and daughter Carol Higgins Clark's novels, this story brings together two of the authors' most popular characters: Cleaning-woman-turned-private-eye Alvirah, and Detective Reilly.

Adventure.title: Dive Olly Dive and the Octopus Rescue
Adventure.description: When Charley the Octopus inadvertently enters a “Star Finder” variety show and boogies himself to fame and fortune, it’s not all it's cracked up to be and it’s down to our heroes Olly and Beth to daringly rescue their friend.

Adventure.title: Double, Double, Toil and Trouble
Adventure.description: Determined twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) try to trick an evil aunt (Cloris Leachman) out of a magic moonstone and save their family home.

Adventure.title: The Eagle and the Hawk
Adventure.description: In 1863 two U.S. law enforcers discover a plot to overthrow Mexico's ruler and invade Texas. Lots of action and fabulous cinematography by James Wong Howe.

Adventure.title: El Camino Hacia El Dorado
Adventure.description: Al desembarcar en las playas de El Dorado, Tulio, Miguel son confundidos con dioses y son adorados con riquezas. Deben decidir entre huir con el oro o  salvar a los pobladores de El Dorado.

Adventure.title: Embrace of the Serpent
Adventure.description: At once blistering and poetic, the ravages of colonialism cast a dark shadow over the South American landscape in EMBRACE OF THE SERPENT, the third feature by Ciro Guerra. Filmed in stunning black-and-white, SERPENT centers on Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and the last survivor of his people, and the two scientists who, over the course of 40 years, build a friendship with him. The film was inspired by the real-life journals of two explorers (Theodor Koch-Grünberg and Richard Evans Schultes) who traveled through the Colombian Amazon during the last century in search of the sacred and difficult-to-find psychedelic Yakruna plant. 2016 Academy Award Nominee - Best Foreign Language Film

Adventure.title: Escape from Mr. Lemoncello's Library
Adventure.description: When twelve lucky kids win an invitation into legendary gamemaker Lemoncello's extraordinary, high-tech library, they have no idea what's in store. By navigating an elaborate scavenger hunt, they must compete to be the first to find their way out. Rating: TV-G

Adventure.title: Fallen
Adventure.description: Upon entering a mysterious reform school, Luce finds herself drawn into a love triangle and discovers her own love story that has been ongoing for centuries.

Adventure.title: Fantastica: A Boonie Bears Adventure
Adventure.description: In the cartoon multiverse known as Fantastica, the intrepid robot Coco discovers the location of an ancient artifact. But with a group of thieves hot on Coco’s trail, Coco will have to rely on a group of friends to help protect Fantastica.

Adventure.title: Free Willy 3: The Rescue
Adventure.description: A 10-year-old boy whose father is running an illegal whaling operation is caught in a dilemma when Willy and his pod are threatened.

Adventure.title: The French Connection
Adventure.description: Gene Hackman stars in this 1971 Best Picture Oscar(R) winner about a maverick cop who stops a huge heroin shipment into New York.

Adventure.title: Fun Size
Adventure.description: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out.

Adventure.title: Gangster No. 1
Adventure.description: GANGSTER NO. 1 chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent and ruthless English gangster.

Adventure.title: Getaway
Adventure.description: A washed-up race car driver finds himself in a race against time to save his abducted wife in this heart-pounding thriller.

Adventure.title: Gintama
Adventure.description: Set in the Edo shogunate where power of samurai is on decline as the aliens from outer space have invaded the country and outlawed their swords, it portrays the life of a handyman Gintoki Sakata, whom still carries the heart of a samurai.

Adventure.title: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
Adventure.description: In this hilarious, action packed western, three villains race to uncover a buried treasure fighting wild bandits, gangsters and each other along the way.

Adventure.title: Grace Jones: Bloodlight and Bami
Adventure.description: A larger-than-life entertainer, an androgynous glam-pop diva – Grace Jones is all these things and more. Sophie Fiennes’s documentary goes beyond the traditional music biography, offering a portrait as stylish and unconventional as its subject.

Adventure.title: Half-Shell Heroes: Blast to the Past
Adventure.description: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles find themselves on the adventure of a lifetime when they accidentally time travel back to the Jurassic Era! Rating: TV-Y7

Adventure.title: The Hangman
Adventure.description: A marshal goes after a man wanted for murder but finds himself pitted against an entire Western town.

Adventure.title: Hector and the Search for Happiness
Adventure.description: A psychiatrist searches the globe to find the secret of happiness.

Adventure.title: Hey Arnold! The Jungle Movie
Adventure.description: Arnold and his class win a service trip to San Lorenzo. But when their trip takes a turn for the worst, their only hope of getting home may be retracing the dangerous path that led to Arnold's parents' disappearance.

Adventure.title: Hot Guys with Guns
Adventure.description: Chinatown meets Boystown when an aspiring actor and a grizzled detective team up in this modern take on the old-fashioned detective story.

Adventure.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
Adventure.description: On his first day at a new school, eleven-year-old Billy goes up against the school bully in a challenge that ends up with a total gross-out date...to eat 10 worms in one day!

Adventure.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Adventure.description: When the appearance of a Light Fury dragon coincides with the darkest threat they have faced, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world and discover their destinies.

Adventure.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
Adventure.description: Raised on hip-hop and foster care, defiant city kid Ricky gets a fresh start in the New Zealand countryside. He quickly finds himself at home with his new foster family: the loving Aunt Bella, the cantankerous Uncle Hec, and dog Tupac. When a tragedy strikes that threatens to ship Ricky to another home, both he and Hec go on the run in the bush. As a national manhunt ensues, the newly branded outlaws must face their options: go out in a blaze of glory or overcome their differences and survive as a family.  Equal parts road comedy and rousing adventure story, director Taika Waititi (WHAT WE DO IN THE SHADOWS, upcoming THOR: RAGNORAK) masterfully weaves lively humor with emotionally honest performances by Sam Neill and Julian Dennison....

Adventure.title: I, Frankenstein
Adventure.description: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries old war between two immortal clans.

Adventure.title: Innocent
Adventure.description: Bill Pullman (Independence Day, Torchwood) stars as Rusty Sabich, a judge charged with the murder of his wife, a situation that comes 20 years after he was cleared in the death of his mistress.

Adventure.title: Inside Out
Adventure.description: After being released from prison after serving 13 years, AJ's dreams of living a crime-free life soon come to an end when he discovers his childhood friend, Jack, has been marked for death.

Adventure.title: Jackass 3
Adventure.description: Johnny Knoxville and the rest of his friends (Bam Margera, Ryan Dunn, Steve-O) perform outrageous stunts and pranks.

Adventure.title: Johnny Guitar
Adventure.description: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

Adventure.title: Johnny Reno
Adventure.description: One man stands alone against the fury of mob justice. Threats. Fists. Bullets. Fire. By one means or another, riled-up folks at Stone Junction are going to have their way.

Adventure.title: Judgment Day
Adventure.description: An FBI agent and an ex-con hunt for a cult leader holding hostage a scientist whose asteroid-destroying weapon can save Earth.

Adventure.title: The Jungle Bunch: The Movie
Adventure.description: Raised in Africa, a penguin (John Lithgow) must return to the Antarctic to save his family and friends from the invading walruses.

Adventure.title: The Kid
Adventure.description: Vincent D'Onofrio directs this story of Rio, a young fan of Billy the Kid, who asks the fabled gunslinger to help him free his kidnappedsister, Sara, from his uncle's dastardly grip.

Adventure.title: Killer Joe
Adventure.description: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

Adventure.title: The Ladybug
Adventure.description: Seven-spotted ladybug Rube sets out on a wild and crazy adventure to visit Golden Canyon, the legendary bug utopia and home to a kingdom of insects he once saw on television.

Adventure.title: The Last Airbender
Adventure.description: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

Adventure.title: The Last Days
Adventure.description: As a mysterious epidemic spreads across the planet trapping humanity indoors, one man sets off on a dangerous quest to save his missing girlfriend.

Adventure.title: The Last Man
Adventure.description: In this apocalyptic thriller, Hayden Christensen plays a vet suffering from PTSD who takes the advice of a street prophet (Harvey Keitel) and starts preparing for the end of days.

Adventure.title: The Last Stand
Adventure.description: After leaving the LAPD wracked with remorse and regret, Sheriff Ray Owens (Schwarzenegger) moved to a sleepy border town that now stands between Gabriel Cortez (Eduardo Noriega), the most notorious drug kingpin in the world and his freedom.

Adventure.title: The Last Warrior
Adventure.description: A 9.5-magnitude earthquake rocks Southern California, causing it to break off from the rest of the continent to form a desert island. The last warrior, Green Beret Nick Preston, leads a military patrol onto the devastated island to help the survivors.

Adventure.title: Law of the Lawless
Adventure.description: In Kansas during the 1880's, Clem Rogers known as the "hanging judge" arrives to try the son of the town's most influential man for murder. He refuses a bribe and is framed for a set-up crime.

Adventure.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
Adventure.description: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.

Adventure.title: Lonely Man, The
Adventure.description: A gunfighter turns rancher at the mercy of a son who hates him and a gambler who wants to kill him.

Adventure.title: Lord of War
Adventure.description: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage stars in this taut, action-packed tale of a notorious arms dealer who sold weapons to dictators and successfully outran the law for nearly twenty years.

Adventure.title: The Lovers
Adventure.description: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett.

Adventure.title: Luis and the Aliens
Adventure.description: 12-year-old Luis befriends a trio of awkward aliens who’ve gotten stuck on Earth after watching too much home-shopping network. With a neglectful father at home, Luis decides to escape with the aliens so he can avoid being sent away to a boarding school.

Adventure.title: The Magic Hockey Skates
Adventure.description: Pint sized nine year old Joey has one dream - to be a Hockey Champion. Joey believes that brand new Rocky Rockets Skates will help him achieve his dream, but to his dismay his Father can only afford some beaten up second hand skates.

Adventure.title: A Man Alone
Adventure.description: Framed for a robbery, a gunman hides out in the home of the local sheriff and gradually wins his trust and respect. Now they must face the vengeful townspeople in a bloody war.

Adventure.title: Man on a Ledge
Adventure.description: While a man teetering on a 21st-floor ledge diverts attention, the world’s greatest diamond heist is underway.

Adventure.title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
Adventure.description: An American war hero who secretly assassinated Adolf Hitler has now been called upon to take out another global threat – Bigfoot.

Adventure.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: the Movie
Adventure.description: The powerless Rangers journey to a distant planet in search of a female warrior who can help them regain their strength.

Adventure.title: Missing Link
Adventure.description: "Missing Link" is a globe-trotting comedy-adventure about a dashing investigator of myths and monsters (Hugh Jackman) and the surprisingly silly and soulful beast he discovers (Zach Galifianakis).

Adventure.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
Adventure.description: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster of epic proportions.

Adventure.title: Moll Flanders
Adventure.description: The unwavering hope and determination of a poverty-stricken young girl who goes from childhood in an orphanage to teen life on the street to eventually finding love with an unconventional artist.

Adventure.title: The Monkey King 3
Adventure.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Adventure.title: Monos
Adventure.description: A young group of soldiers and rebels keep watch over an American hostage, Doctora. After an ambush drives the squadron into the jungle, both the mission and the intricate bonds between the group begin to disintegrate.

Adventure.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
Adventure.description: A nearly 50-foot tall woman leads a gaggle of other 1950s throwback monsters into battle against an alien menace in this animated comedy.

Adventure.title: Mortdecai
Adventure.description: Depp, Paltrow, and McGregor star in this globe-trotting comedy about an unlikely team recruited to find a stolen, priceless painting.

Adventure.title: Mud
Adventure.description: After two boys discover a mysterious outlaw named Mud hiding on a deserted island in the Mississippi River, they embark on a dangerous, life-changing odyssey to reunite Mud with his long-lost love.

Adventure.title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas
Adventure.description: Clumsy Minty Pony (Tabitha St. Germain) breaks the holiday candy cane that guides Santa Claus to Ponyville every year; includes bonus episode "Dancing in the Clouds."

Adventure.title: My Little Pony: The Princess Promenade
Adventure.description: The ponies' annual Spring Promenade goes awry when a 1,000-year-old dragon awakens and fulfills a royal prophecy.

Adventure.title: My Little Pony: Twinkle Wish Adventure
Adventure.description: All the ponies cannot wait for the Winter Wishes festival where the Wishing Star grants each pony one special wish. But when the Wishing Star disappears, they go on a journey to find it. But will they make it back in time for the festival?

Adventure.title: National Lampoon's European Vacation
Adventure.description: After winning a European vacation on a game show, Clark Griswold (Chevy Chase) convinces his reluctant family to accompany him. His wife, Ellen (Beverly D'Angelo), is excited, but daughter Audrey (Dana Hill) is reluctant to leave her boyfriend behind, while teen son Rusty (Jason Lively) dreams of meeting girls. After arriving in London, the clan encounters one disaster after another as they travel through France, Germany and Italy, while Clark's attempts to cheer everyone up make things worse.

Adventure.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
Adventure.description: National Lampoon's Vacation (1983) stars Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo. The Griswolds (Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo) and family head by station wagon for the California fun park Walley World.

Adventure.title: Naz & Maalik
Adventure.description: Two closeted teens from Bed-Stuy unwittingly find themselves in the crosshairs of the War on Terror when surveillance footage of their secretive behavior is wildly misinterpreted in this smart indie comedy.

Adventure.title: The Next Three Days
Adventure.description: John Brennan will stop at nothing to protect his family, but he's never had to put his life and others' on the line. When his wife is convicted of murder, and all appeals efforts are exhausted, the only hope he sees is breaking her out.

Adventure.title: The Nightingale
Adventure.description: Director Jennifer Kent ("The Babadook") tells the sweeping tale of a young woman's quest for revenge set in 1825 against the perilous and unforgiving terrain of Tasmania.

Adventure.title: Once Upon a Time in Venice
Adventure.description: When Steve Ford's (Bruce Willis) beloved dog, Buddy, is stolen by local thugs, he makes a questionable alliance with their devious leader, Spyder (Jason Momoa) in order to set things straight and get Buddy back where he belongs.

Adventure.title: The Osiris Child
Adventure.description: When a dangerous outbreak threatens to destroy everyone living on a newly colonized planet, Lt. Kane Sommerville goes against orders and leaves his station to rescue his young daughter before it's too late.

Adventure.title: Overdrive
Adventure.description: Scott Eastwood stars in this action-adventure from the writers of 2 Fast 2 Furious and the director of Taken. When two legendary car thieves are caught stealing from a mafia boss, they are given a week to nab a vintage Ferrari, or risk losing everything.

Adventure.title: Overlord
Adventure.description: D-Day invasion finds two paratroopers caught behind enemy lines fighting Nazis and supernatural forces, resulting from a secret Nazi experiment.

Adventure.title: Ozzy
Adventure.description: The lovable Ozzy’s pampered life is thrown into turmoil after his family drops him at Blue Creek before their vacation. Ozzy quickly learns that Blue Creek is a dog prison and he’ll need to rely on some new friends to help him break out and get back home.

Adventure.title: The Pagan King
Adventure.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

Adventure.title: Pilgrimage
Adventure.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

Adventure.title: The Pirates! Band Of Misfits
Adventure.description: Set sail for a fun-filled pirate adventure with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas!

Adventure.title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
Adventure.description: When Destruction rises, can Life prevail?

Adventure.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
Adventure.description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

Adventure.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
Adventure.description: The Soul-Heart Calls…

Adventure.title: Pony Express
Adventure.description: In 1860, Buffalo Bill Cody and Wild Bill Hickok are sent to establish a Pony Express service across California.

Adventure.title: The Prince
Adventure.description: A former assassin is unwittingly drawn back into the life he gave up when he suspects that his daughter has been kidnapped.

Adventure.title: Prospect
Adventure.description: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote moon on the hunt for elusive riches. But there are others roving the moon's toxic forest and the job quickly devolves into a desperate fight to escape.

Adventure.title: The Quake
Adventure.description: From the people that brought you the hit thriller The Wave, this action spectacular forewarns a new catastrophic disaster when the city of Oslo is threatened by a devastating earthquake. Norwegian with English subtitles.

Adventure.title: Racetime
Adventure.description: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

Adventure.title: Radioflash
Adventure.description: In the aftermath of an apocalyptic power outage, a young woman encounters the horrors awaiting her in the darkness as she tries to reunite her family and fight for survival.

Adventure.title: Rango
Adventure.description: A chameleon that aspires to be a swashbuckling hero finds himself in a Western town plagued by bandits and is forced to literally play the role in order to protect it.

Adventure.title: Rare Exports: A Christmas Tale
Adventure.description: In this darkly comic gem, it's Christmas Eve in northern Finland, and an archeological dig has just unearthed Santa Claus. But this Santa isn't one you want coming to town.

Adventure.title: Raze
Adventure.description: Abducted women are forced to fight to the death in an ancient ceremony.

Adventure.title: Regular Show: The Movie
Adventure.description: After accidentally creating a Timenado, two slacker groundskeepers have to go back in time and battle an evil volleyball coach in order to save the universe...and their friendship.

Adventure.title: The Reunion
Adventure.description: After the death of her father, a daughter fulfills his last wish and finds a way to bring her three brothers back together.

Adventure.title: Richard the Lionheart
Adventure.description: The legend of Richard the Lionheart is born as Richard battles an unending onslaught of challengers in order to survive the hellish prison he's been stranded in.

Adventure.title: Righteous Kill
Adventure.description: Two veteran New York City detectives (Academy Award-winners Robert De Niro and Al Pacino) hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

Adventure.title: The Road to El Dorado
Adventure.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Adventure.title: Robin Hood
Adventure.description: The Swashbuckling legend of Robin Hood unfolds in the 12th century when the mighty Normans ruled England with an iron fist.

Adventure.title: Santee
Adventure.description: A lethal bounty hunter seeks to avenge his son's death - if the son of one of his victims lets him live long enough.

Adventure.title: Saving Christmas
Adventure.description: A boy attempts to scientifically prove Santa's existence.

Adventure.title: A Score to Settle
Adventure.description: With only a short time to live, Frankie Carver is released from prison, vowing to track down every last member of the gang that betrayed him.

Adventure.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
Adventure.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

Adventure.title: Sherlock Gnomes
Adventure.description: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo & Juliet, recruit renown detective, Sherlock Gnomes, to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

Adventure.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Adventure.description: Sinbad the sailor must retrieve the stolen Book of Peace from a goddess with a penchant for chaos in this mythological animated tale.

Adventure.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
Adventure.description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

Adventure.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Adventure.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

Adventure.title: The Spy Next Door
Adventure.description: Jackie Chan is a former superspy who wants to settle down with his girlfriend, but first has to battle Russian terrorists.

Adventure.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
Adventure.description: After being dumped by her boyfriend who is a spy, a woman and her friend become embroiled in a conspiracy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Adventure.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Adventure.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Adventure.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Adventure.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Adventure.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

Adventure.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
Adventure.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

Adventure.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Adventure.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

Adventure.title: Stung
Adventure.description: A swanky garden party turns into a nightmare when giant killer wasps attack in this blood-splattered horror comedy.

Adventure.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
