Drama.description: The unwavering hope and determination of a poverty-stricken young girl who goes from childhood in an orphanage to teen life on the street to eventually finding love with an unconventional artist.

Drama.title: Mommy Group Murder
Drama.description: A new mom joins a local mommy group to help her deal with the stress that motherhood is putting on her and her marriage. But she soon learns that membership comes at a price.

Drama.title: Monogamy
Drama.description: Brooklyn photographer Theo - miserable shooting weddings for a living - starts up a cool new business, taking surveillance-style photos of clients. But when an alluring female hires his services, the shutterbug falls into a world of lust and jealousy.

Drama.title: Monsters and Men
Drama.description: A bystander films the death of a black man at the hands of police, which sparks rising tensions in a New York neighborhood as some are moved to take a stand.

Drama.title: Morning Glory
Drama.description: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

Drama.title: The Mountain
Drama.description: Set against the 1950’s "golden age" of American male supremacy, an introverted young photographer (Tye Sheridan) joins a renowned lobotomist (Jeff Goldblum) on a tour to promote the doctor’s recently-debunked procedure.

Drama.title: Ms. Purple
Drama.description: Working as a karaoke hostess in Los Angeles' Koreatown, young Kasie isn't equipped to care for her dying father. With no other choice, she turns to her estranged brother for help, and the two begin a wary reconciliation.

Drama.title: Mud
Drama.description: After two boys discover a mysterious outlaw named Mud hiding on a deserted island in the Mississippi River, they embark on a dangerous, life-changing odyssey to reunite Mud with his long-lost love.

Drama.title: Music From Another Room
Drama.description: A romantic comedy that follows the exploits of Danny, a young man who grew up believing he was destined to marry the girl he helped deliver as a five year old boy when his neighbor went into emergency labor.

Drama.title: My Killer Client
Drama.description: Christa Bright is an aspiring personal stylist who has an instant connection with new client Kat Niven, a shy woman who needs help gaining confidence.

Drama.title: The Myth of the American Sleepover
Drama.description: A gang of high-school students spend a decadent night full of sex, drugs and bad behavior.

Drama.title: Natural Born Killers
Drama.description: A young couple blast their way across the country--and into media stardom--in Oliver Stone's controversial look at violence and the media.

Drama.title: Naz & Maalik
Drama.description: Two closeted teens from Bed-Stuy unwittingly find themselves in the crosshairs of the War on Terror when surveillance footage of their secretive behavior is wildly misinterpreted in this smart indie comedy.

Drama.title: The Next Three Days
Drama.description: John Brennan will stop at nothing to protect his family, but he's never had to put his life and others' on the line. When his wife is convicted of murder, and all appeals efforts are exhausted, the only hope he sees is breaking her out.

Drama.title: Nico, 1988
Drama.description: Nico, 1988 is the story of an artist, a mother, and the woman behind the icon. Approaching 50, Nico's life and career are on the ropes, a far cry from her glamorous days as a Warhol superstar and celebrated vocalist for The Velvet Underground.

Drama.title: The Nightingale
Drama.description: Director Jennifer Kent ("The Babadook") tells the sweeping tale of a young woman's quest for revenge set in 1825 against the perilous and unforgiving terrain of Tasmania.

Drama.title: Nina
Drama.description: Nina Simone (Zoe Saldana) was one of the century’s most extraordinary talents, but fame and fortune came with a price. Rediscovering the meaning of her life and work took courage, strength and one true friend: Clifton Henderson (David Oyelowo).

Drama.title: No One Knows About Persian Cats
Drama.description: Based on true events, two music-obsessed teens risk their lives to form an underground indie rock band in Iran.

Drama.title: No Way Out (Sin Salida)
Drama.description: A former undercover cop (Hector Echavarria) who lost his family and heath to the retribution of a drug cartel tries to start over again, but his past won't stay buried.

Drama.title: Nobody Knows
Drama.description: Four young siblings are forced to rely solely on each other when they are left alone by their loving, yet immature mother.

Drama.title: Non-Fiction
Drama.description: Juliette Binoche and Guillame Canet star in this witty, seductive tale of sex, lies, and literature from acclaimed director Olivier Assayas (Personal Shopper, Carlos).

Drama.title: Notes on a Scandal
Drama.description: Barbara Covett (Judi Dench), a veteran teacher at St. George's, senses a kindred spirit in Sheba Hart (Cate Blanchett), the school's new art teacher. The younger woman's charisma intensely draws in the older, and the two become friends. Then Barbara learns of Sheba's affair with a teenage student and becomes the keeper of the explosive secret.

Drama.title: Odd Thomas
Drama.description: Small-town fry cook Odd Thomas (Anton Yelchin) is an ordinary guy with a paranormal secret: he sees dead people, everywhere.

Drama.title: Oh Lucy!
Drama.description: Stagnating in late middle age, a Tokyo ‘office lady’ discovers her alter ego in an English class, sending her on a comedic odyssey through desire, passion, betrayal, and ultimately the open freeways of Southern California.

Drama.title: Once Upon a Time
Drama.description: Based on the best-selling fantasy novel Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossoms, ONCE UPON A TIME is a story of epic battles, deep passion, and the powerful forces that drive mortals and gods alike toward revenge, loyalty, and eternal love.

Drama.title: Operation Finale
Drama.description: This thrilling true story follows the 1960 covert mission of legendary Mossad agent Peter Malkin as he infiltrates Argentina and captures Adolf Eichmann.

Drama.title: The Other Man
Drama.description: A taut thriller, The Other Man is an intimate tale of a man who discovers his wife's infidelity and sets out to track down his rival. Driven to pursue the mystery surrounding his wife’s adultery, Liam Neeson embarks on a global pursuit with a haunted passion that begins to probe the nature not simply of jealousy, but of loss and forgiveness. The film is beautifully shot on location in Milan and Lake Como as well as in London and Ely by renowned cinematographer Harris Zambarloukos (Mama Mia!, Heart in the Sand.)

Drama.title: Out of Blue
Drama.description: Patricia Clarkson is a New Orleans detective whose hunt for a killer draws her into a mystery of cosmic proportions in this tantalizing noir thriller.

Drama.title: Overdrive
Drama.description: Scott Eastwood stars in this action-adventure from the writers of 2 Fast 2 Furious and the director of Taken. When two legendary car thieves are caught stealing from a mafia boss, they are given a week to nab a vintage Ferrari, or risk losing everything.

Drama.title: The Pagan King
Drama.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

Drama.title: Paper Covers Rock
Drama.description: In this gripping drama, a young woman is pushed to the brink as she fights to regain custody of her six-year-old daughter.

Drama.title: Paranoid Park
Drama.description: In this thriller from Gus Van Sant, a teen skater accidentally kills a security guard and slips into an inner world of mesmerizing paranoia.

Drama.title: The Party
Drama.description: "Deliciously wicked fun" ensues when a group of friends get together to discover secrets, sex & lies.

Drama.title: The Party's Just Beginning
Drama.description: A surreal coming of age story told from the perspective of a young Scottish woman (Karen Gillan) trying to cope with the suicide of her best friend and struggling to confront what's truly haunting her.

Drama.title: Pawn Sacrifice
Drama.description: American chess legend Bobby Fischer (Tobey Maguire) and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) enthrall the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

Drama.title: The Pawnbroker
Drama.description: Sol, the embittered survivor of a Nazi death camp, is now a Harlem pawnbroker. He harshly condemns his clientele as the dregs of society, and ridicules his idealistic assistant, Ortiz. But when Ortiz risks his life for Sol, he learns the truth about hop

Drama.title: Pegasus: Pony with a Broken Wing
Drama.description: When tween girl Sydney and a neighbor boy find a mysterious pony with an injured wing, they secretly heal the creature while racing to save Sydney’s family ranch from developers.

Drama.title: Person to Person
Drama.description: A record collector and his roommate, a teenager and her best friend, and a rookie reporter and her metal-head supervisor. A day in the life of an eclectic group of New Yorkers. Starring Abbi Jacobson, Michael Cera, Tavi Gevinson and more.

Drama.title: The Phantom of the Opera
Drama.description: Deep in the passageways below the Paris Opera lives a lonely, talented, horribly disfigured man who revels in terrorizing the theater's employees as The Phantom of the Opera.

Drama.title: Pi
Drama.description: Max is a genius mathematician who built a supercomputer that provides the key for understanding all existence. Representatives from a Hasidic cabalistic sect and high-powered Wall Street firm hear of the secret and attempt to seduce him.

Drama.title: Pilgrimage
Drama.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

Drama.title: Playing It Cool
Drama.description: A young man meets and instantly falls in love with an engaged woman.

Drama.title: Please Stand By
Drama.description: Dakota Fanning stars as a woman who escapes a group home hoping to get her Star Trek script produced in Hollywood. On the way she must conquer a new world full of challenges. Also starring Toni Collette and Patton Oswalt.

Drama.title: Pray for Rain
Drama.description: Young New York journalist, Emma Gardner, returns to the idyllic Central California farming community where she was raised to investigate the suspicious circumstances of her father's death even though it puts her in great danger.

Drama.title: Precious
Drama.description: In Harlem, an overweight, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.

Drama.title: The Prince
Drama.description: A former assassin is unwittingly drawn back into the life he gave up when he suspects that his daughter has been kidnapped.

Drama.title: Princess Cyd
Drama.description: Eager to escape life with her single father, 16-year-old athlete Cyd visits her novelist aunt in Chicago over the summer. There, she falls for a girl in the neighborhood, while she and her aunt gently challenge each other in the realms of sex and spirit.

Drama.title: The Princess of Montpensier
Drama.description: The life of a ravishing young princess is torn apart by lust and forbidden desire, in this epic period drama.

Drama.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
Drama.description: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his polyamorous relationship with his wife and his mistress who would inspire his creation of the superheroine, Wonder Woman.

Drama.title: Proxy
Drama.description: While walking home Esther Woodhouse is brutally attacked and disfigured by a hooded assailant. This horrible event seems to be a blessing in disguise when Esther finds consolation in a support group. Her life of sadness and solitude is opened up to friendship, understanding, and even acceptance. However, friendship and understanding can be very dangerous things when accepted by the wrong people, as Esther soon embarks down a dark path of obsession.

Drama.title: A Puppy for Christmas
Drama.description: All Noelle wants for Christmas is a puppy. But her furry friend is mischievous and gets them both evicted. Spending the holidays with her coworker, sparks begin to fly. When Noelle's ex shows up, she must decide which man she wants.

Drama.title: Puzzle
Drama.description: In this delightful and charming comedy, a frustrated housewife who longs for escape finds true bliss when she discovers a passion for puzzles.

Drama.title: Pyewacket
Drama.description: When you're dealing with demons, be careful what you wish for... A teenager's death curse plunges her into an unholy occult nightmare. From the director of Backcountry.

Drama.title: The Quiet Ones
Drama.description: When a crazed university professor and his team of students set out to cure a patient, the unthinkable happens. Trusting in their leader and his motives, Brian and his fellow students find themselves far from help...

Drama.title: A Quiet Place
Drama.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

Drama.title: Racer and the Jailbird
Drama.description: Loyalties are tested when a gangster and race car driver fall in love.

Drama.title: Rain
Drama.description: A chance encounter during a traffic jam, changes two people's lives forever in this gripping drama.

Drama.title: The Ramen Girl
Drama.description: An American girl abandoned by her boyfriend in Tokyo finds her calling in an unlikely place: a local ramen house. Run by a tyrannical chef who doesn't speak a word of English. Abby learns how to put passion and spirit into her life as well as her cooking.

Drama.title: Red Dog: True Blue
Drama.description: When eleven-year-old Mick is shipped off to his grandfather's cattle station in the remote Pilbara region of Western Australia, he prepares himself for a life of dull hardship

Drama.title: Renoir
Drama.description: Set on the French Riviera in the summer of 1915, RENOIR tells the story of celebrated impressionist painter Pierre-Auguste Renoir, and his middle son Jean, who returns home to convalesce after being wounded in World War I.

Drama.title: The Resident
Drama.description: Juliet, has found the perfect New York apartment to start a new life after separating from her husband. It's got spacious rooms, and a handsome landlord. But there are secrets behind every wall as Juliet gets the feeling that she is not alone.

Drama.title: Ricochet
Drama.description: Two homicide detectives find their careers – and lives – on the line when they get caught up in a case of murder and betrayal in high-society Savannah.

Drama.title: Righteous Kill
Drama.description: Two veteran New York City detectives (Academy Award-winners Robert De Niro and Al Pacino) hunt a vigilante who may be one of their own.

Drama.title: The Road to El Dorado
Drama.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Drama.title: Rodeo & Juliet
Drama.description: A city girl is forced to go to the country where she meets a special horse and a young cowboy who teaaches her to barrel race while her mother reconnects with her former fiancé.

Drama.title: The Romantics
Drama.description: Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.

Drama.title: Romeo and Juliet
Drama.description: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

Drama.title: Run the Race
Drama.description: Two desperate brothers sacrifice to earn a college scholarship and the brothers' ticket out of town. When a devastating injury puts Zach-and his dreams-on the sidelines, David laces up his track cleats to salvage their future and point Zach toward hope.

Drama.title: Running with the Devil
Drama.description: When a cocaine shipment is compromised, a drug cartel’s CEO, known as The Boss orders his most trusted henchman, The Cook, and his partner, another master drug trafficker known as The Man, on a dangerous journey to audit the company’s supply chain.

Drama.title: Sangre de Mi Sangre
Drama.description: Winner at Sundance, this dog-eat-dog thriller is about a Mexican boy whose identity is stolen on his way to finally meet his father. Now he must prove he is the real son.

Drama.title: Savage Youth
Drama.description: The lives of six troubled teens in a racially-divided town take a violent turn when drugs and broken hearts intermix. Based on true events.

Drama.title: Say Anything...
Drama.description: John Cusack stars as an aimless high-school graduate who tries to win the hand of the class brain in this teen classic.

Drama.title: Scenic Route
Drama.description: Stranded on an isolated desert road, two life-long friends fight for survival as their already strained relationship spirals into knife-wielding madness.

Drama.title: The Second Mother
Drama.description: The longtime housekeeper for a wealthy São Paulo family, Val is committed to loyalty and respect. But her values and the dynamic of the whole household, are challenged when her teen daughter visits in this astute, socially conscious comedy.

Drama.title: Serena
Drama.description: In Depression-era North Carolina, the barren wife (Jennifer Lawrence) of an ambitious timber baron (Bradley Cooper) sets out to murder the woman who bore her husband an illegitimate son.

Drama.title: Shoplifters
Drama.description: On the margins of Tokyo, a dysfunctional band of outsiders is united by fierce loyalty and a penchant for petty theft. When the young son is arrested, secrets are exposed that upend their tenuous, below-the-radar existence.

Drama.title: Sidewalls
Drama.description: Martin and Mariana are destined for one another; they're passionate about the same subjects, love the same movies and enjoy the same hobbies—only they have yet to meet.

Drama.title: Silent Tongue
Drama.description: Silent Tongue is a mute Kiowa who is raped by Eamon McCree, the owner of the Kickapoo Traveling Medicine Show. Eamon attempts to make up for his crime by marrying her. Instead, she enacts a bitter retribution through daughters.

Drama.title: Silent Witness
Drama.description: In SILENT WITNESS, Dermot Mulroney stars as a prominent defense attorney who returns to his small hometown to defend an old friend accused of murder. Also starring Anne Heche.

Drama.title: The Simone Biles Story: Courage to Soar
Drama.description: Based on her book, this World Premiere film follows Simone Biles through the sacrifices and hard work that led her to win 19 Olympic and World Championship medals and ultimately cemented her stake as one of the greatest gymnasts of all time.

Drama.title: A Simple Favor
Drama.description: "A Simple Favor," directed by Paul Feig, centers around Stephanie (Anna Kendrick), a mommy vlogger who seeks to uncover the truth behind her best friend Emily's (Blake Lively) disappearance.

Drama.title: Skate Kitchen
Drama.description: Camille's life as a lonely suburban teenager changes dramatically when she befriends a group of girl skateboarders. As she journeys deeper into this raw New York City subculture, she begins to understand the true meaning of friendship.

Drama.title: The Skeleton Twins
Drama.description: Starring Kristen Wiig, Bill Hader, and Luke Wilson. Having both coincidentally cheated death on the same day, estranged twins reunite with the possibility of mending their relationship.

Drama.title: So B. It
Drama.description: Based on the New York Times Best-selling novel, a young prodigy named Heidi has a lucky streak that has a way of pointing her in the right direction.

Drama.title: So This Is Christmas
Drama.description: Eighteen-year-old Ashley's life is headed in the wrong direction. She's been hanging out with a bad crowd and seeking an escape from the drama at home.

Drama.title: Someone Else
Drama.description: David constantly stresses over his love life and feels a choice must be made, stay with his too-agreeable girlfriend, Lisa, or go after exciting and tricky Nina.

Drama.title: The Sound of Silence
Drama.description: Peter Sarsgaard and Rashida Jones star in this quietly moving tale of a successful "house tuner" who becomes stifled when he meets a client he can't quite tune into.

Drama.title: Southie
Drama.description: Three years ago when Danny Quinn left Southie, a tough Irish working-class neighborhood in South Boston, he left behind a world of crime and betrayal. Upon his return, Danny is forced to make a risky decision.

Drama.title: The Spirit of Christmas
Drama.description: Kate is sent to broker the sale of Hollygrove Inn where she discovers Daniel and agrees to help him solve the mystery of his murder to help him move on, but she didn’t plan on falling in love along the way.

Drama.title: The Square
Drama.description: Christian is the respected curator of a contemporary art museum, a divorced but devoted father of two who drives an electric car and supports good causes. His next show is “The Square”, an installation which invites passersby to altruism, reminding them of their role as responsible fellow human beings. But sometimes, it is difficult to live up to your own ideals: Christian’s foolish response to the theft of his phone drags him into shameful situations. Meanwhile, the museum's PR agency has created an unexpected campaign for “The Square”. The response is overblown and sends Christian, as well as the museum, into an existential crisis.

Drama.title: The Standoff at Sparrow Creek
Drama.description: An ex-cop realizes that the shooter at a police funeral is one of his fellow militiamen and must use extreme measures to prevent further bloodshed.

Drama.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Drama.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Drama.title: Starfish
Drama.description: With reality fraying at the edges, Aubrey (Virginia Gardner) finds herself following a string of mixtapes left by her dead friend. The clues unravel the secrets of a mysterious Signal; one that could either save the world... or condemn it.

Drama.title: Stella's Last Weekend
Drama.description: Brothers Jack (Nat Wolff) and Oliver (Alex Wolff) reunite to put their beloved dog to sleep. While their zany mother plans a party to celebrate Stella’s life, things go hilariously awry when the brothers discover they love the same girl.

Drama.title: Still
Drama.description: A lost hiker in the Appalachian Mountains is taken in by a couple holding a deep secret.

Drama.title: The Strange Ones
Drama.description: Mysterious events surround two travelers, presumably brothers, as they make their way across a remote American landscape. On the surface all seems normal, but what appears to be a simple vacation soon gives way to a dark and complex web of secrets.

Drama.title: Suburbicon
Drama.description: From director George Clooney, the small idyllic town of Suburbicon is the perfect place for Gardner Lodge (Academy Award  winner Matt Damon) to make a home. But beneath this tranquil surface lies a disturbing reality, where nothing is as it seems.

Drama.title: Super
Drama.description: When sad-sack loser Frank (Rainn Wilson) sees his ex-addict wife (Liv Tyler) willingly snatched by a seductive drug dealer (Kevin Bacon), he finds himself bereft and wholly unable to cope. But soon he decides to fight back under the guise of a DIY superhero called Crimson Bolt. With a hand-made suit, a wrench, and a crazed sidekick named Boltie (Ellen Page), the Crimson Bolt beats his way through the mean streets of crime in hopes of saving his wife.  The rules were written a long time ago: You are not supposed to molest children, cut lines or key cars; if you do, prepare to face the wrath of the Crimson Bolt!

Drama.title: Support the Girls
Drama.description: Regina Hall (Girls Trip) stars as the hardworking manager of a "sports bar with curves" who runs the joint like a family, even as sketchy employees, bad customers and an even worse boss put her good nature to the test.

Drama.title: The Sweet Life
Drama.description: The classic story of “Boy Meets Girl” … until Girl convinces Boy to drive to San Francisco with her … so they can throw themselves off the Golden Gate Bridge.  Only they fall in love along the way.

Drama.title: Switching Goals
Drama.description: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen executive produce and star in the rousing comedy of two sisters who hatch the ultimate scheme to find out how their other half lives--by Switching Goals.

Drama.title: Tall Stranger
Drama.description: In the post-Civil War Colorado Territory, a rancher rescued from death by a wagon-train demonstrates his gratitude by guiding the train to the newly-opened land. He also finds the rustlers who shot him, as well as true love.

Drama.title: Tangerine
Drama.description: It's Christmas Eve in Tinseltown and Sin-Dee (newcomer Kitana Kiki Rodriguez) is back on the block. Upon hearing that her pimp boyfriend (James Ransone, STARLET, "Generation Kill") hasn't been faithful during the 28 days she was locked up, the working girl and her best friend, Alexandra (newcomer Mya Taylor), embark on a mission to get to the bottom of the scandalous rumor. Their rip-roaring odyssey leads them through various subcultures of Los Angeles, including an Armenian family dealing with their own repercussions of infidelity. Director Sean Baker’s prior films (STARLET, PRINCE OF BROADWAY) brought rich texture and intimate detail to worlds seldom seen on film. TANGERINE follows suit, bursting off the screen with energy and style. A decidedly modern Christmas tale told on the streets of L.A., TANGERINE defies expectation at every turn.

Drama.title: Tangerines
Drama.description: During the growing conflict between separatists in the wake of the Soviet Union's break-up, two immigrant farmers make the dangerous decision to remain in a war torn area long enough to harvest their tangerine crop.

Drama.title: The Taste of Money
Drama.description: When the private assistant of a wealthy socialite reveals her husband's salacious affair, he is entangled in a web of sex, love & deceit that could threaten his life & career.

Drama.title: A Taxi Driver
Drama.description: In this powerful drama based on a true story, a down-on-his-luck taxi driver hired by a foreign journalist finds himself in a life-or-death struggle in the midst of the Gwangju Uprising.

Drama.title: A Teacher
Drama.description: A popular young high school teacher engaged in a passionate secret affair with one of her students gets pulled deeper into their mutual fantasy world, even as the danger of discovery threatens their relationship.

Drama.title: Teen Spirit
Drama.description: Violet (Elle Fanning) is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

Drama.title: The Tenant
Drama.description: A lonely young man rents a flat that was formerly occupied by a girl who committed suicide. Gradually he begins to assume her identity, dressing in her clothes, and eventually throwing himself out of the same window from which she jumped to her death.

Drama.title: Tenderness
Drama.description: Lori Cranston (Sophie Traub) is a confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life. She discovers and becomes enthralled with Eric (Jon Foster), a young man with a violent past.

Drama.title: Terminal
Drama.description: Margot Robbie, Simon Pegg and Mike Myers star in this twisted tale of two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a waitress leading a dangerous double life.

Drama.title: Thelma
Drama.description: Thelma is a powerful supernatural thriller about a young student who, upon falling in love for the first time, discovers that she has terrifying and inexplicable powers.

Drama.title: This Beautiful Fantastic
Drama.description: A contemporary fairy tale set against the backdrop of a London garden, its an unlikely friendship between a reclusive young woman who dreams of writing children's books and a cranky widower.

Drama.title: Those People
Drama.description: On Manhattan’s gilded Upper East Side, Charlie, a young painter, finds the man of his dreams in Tim, an older pianist from across the globe.

Drama.title: Time Freak
Drama.description: Physics prodigy Stillman (Asa Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Sophie Turner) suddenly dumps him.

Drama.title: The Time That Remains
Drama.description: A vividly entertaining and moving drama about one family's courageous fight for survival in war-torn Israel.

Drama.title: Tom of Finland
Drama.description: Finnish artist Touko Laaksonen becomes famous for his homoerotic works.

Drama.title: The Tomorrow Man
Drama.description: Ed spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie spends her life shopping for things she may never use. In a small town somewhere in America, they try to find love while trying not to get lost in each other's stuff.

Drama.title: Touched With Fire
Drama.description: From Executive Producer Spike Lee. Katie Holmes and Luke Kirby star as bipolar poets who begin a romance that puts their hearts (and minds) to the ultimate test.

Drama.title: Tracktown
Drama.description: A young long-distance runner twists her ankle during her first Olympic Trials and must do something she’s never done before: take a day off.

Drama.title: True Grit
Drama.description: A tough U.S. Marshal helps a stubborn young woman track down her father's murderer.

Drama.title: The Truth About Christmas
Drama.description: An encounter with a Santa results in a drastic change.

Drama.title: Turtles Can Fly
Drama.description: In a Kurdish refugee camp in 2003, residents await the U.S. invasion of Iraq, hoping for Saddam's defeat but fearing a violent aftermath. Satellite (Soran Ebrahim) organizes children into work gangs, disarming and selling land mines to arms dealers. Satellite falls for Agrin (Avaz Latif), who comes to the camp with one-armed brother Hengov (Hiresh Feysal Rahman) and baby brother Riga (Abdol Rahman Karim). As the invasion starts, Satellite looks for a satellite dish so the camp can watch the war.

Drama.title: Two Family House
Drama.description: Blue-collar Italian-American Buddy Visalo (Michael Rispoli) has a record of failed business ventures. After buying a rundown home, his new scheme is to transform the bottom floor into a neighborhood bar.

Drama.title: Tyrel
Drama.description: Tyler (Jason Mitchell) is the lone black man on a weekend getaway with hard partying white strangers. As the testosterone and alcohol get out of hand, Tyler's trip begins to feel like a nightmare.

Drama.title: Under the Tuscan Sun
Drama.description: A recently divorced San Francisco writer impulsively buys a villa during a trip to Italy and embarks on a life-changing adventure.

Drama.title: Undrafted
Drama.description: When twelve ragtag teammates set out to play what should be a meaningless summer intramural baseball game, it ends up becoming the most important game of their lives.

Drama.title: Unforgettable
Drama.description: A forensics expert (Ray Liotta) is thrust into a heart-stopping adventure when he takes an experimental 'memory' drug in the hopes of discovering his wife's murderer.

Drama.title: Unmade Beds
Drama.description: A London apartment becomes the center of sexual and reckless play for a group of twenty-somethings as they swap lovers and identities in search of their true selves.

Drama.title: Up in the Air
Drama.description: Ryan Bingham  is living the high life. Flying all over the world on business, he never stops moving...until he meets Alex, a fellow passenger and learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections made along the way.

Drama.title: Urban Country
Drama.description: Faith, a troubled 18-year-old city girl, moves to a horse ranch in the country to help her sick mother. While there, Faith learns to embrace the country lifestyle and the importance of family, hard work and helping others.

Drama.title: Venus in Fur
Drama.description: Based on the Tony ® Award-winning Broadway play by David Ives, VENUS IN FUR is the latest film from master filmmaker Roman Polanski. Alone in a Paris theater after a long day of auditioning actresses for his new play, writer-director Thomas (Mathieu Amalric) complains that no actress he's seen has what it takes to play the lead female character: a woman who enters into an agreement with her male counterpart to dominate him as her slave. Thomas is about to leave the theater when actress Vanda (Emmanuelle Seigner) bursts in, a whirlwind of erratic - and, it turns out, erotic - energy. At first she seems to embody everything Thomas has been lamenting. She is pushy, foul-mouthed, desperate and ill-prepared - or so it seems. When Thomas finally, reluctantly, agrees to let her try out for the part, he is stunned and captivated by her transformation. Not only is Vanda a perfect fit (even sharing the character's name), but she apparently has researched the role exhaustively, learned her lines by heart and even bought her own props. The likeness proves to be much more than skin-deep. As the extended "audition" builds momentum, Thomas moves from attraction to obsession until, with Vanda taking an ever more dominant role, the balance of power shifts completely.

Drama.title: Veronica Mars
Drama.description: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

Drama.title: Vice
Drama.description: The untold true story of Vice President Dick Cheney, a Washington insider who changed the course of history.

Drama.title: The Villainess
Drama.description: Bloody revenge is at the heart of this stylish action-thriller that doses the classic femme fatale story with a shot of adrenaline as it follows a former assassin who will stop at nothing to cut ties to her past.

Drama.title: Villains
Drama.description: A pair of amateur criminals break into a suburban home and stumble upon a dark secret that two sadistic homeowners will do anything to keep from getting out.

Drama.title: Vincere
Drama.description: In this provocative, erotic romance, Benito Mussolini's feisty mistress will stop at nothing to be in the arms of her powerful lover.

Drama.title: Vita & Virginia
Drama.description: The seductive true story of Virginia Woolf's love affair with socialite Vita Sackville-West, who inspired one of Woolf's greatest works of literature.

Drama.title: Vox Lux
Drama.description: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star (Natalie Portman).

Drama.title: Waiting to Exhale
Drama.description: Four successful African-American women endure the ups and downs of modern love in this witty, often hilarious film based on the best-selling novel by Terry McMillan.

Drama.title: Walk Away Renee
Drama.description: A sweet and affecting film about filmmaker Jonathan Caouette's journey of self-discovery on a transformative road trip with his mother.

Drama.title: Walking With the Enemy
Drama.description: During World War II, a young Hungarian (Jonas Armstrong) disguises himself as a Nazi officer to save his family and thousands of his countrymen from the death camps. Meanwhile, Hungary's regent (Ben Kingsley) takes great risks to save his country.

Drama.title: Warrior
Drama.description: WARRIOR tells the inspirational story of an estranged family that finds redemption in the unlikeliest of places-the MMA ring.

Drama.title: The Wave
Drama.description: Although anticipated, no one is really ready when the mountain pass above the scenic, narrow Norwegian fjord Geiranger collapses and creates an 85-meter high violent tsunami. A geologist is one of those caught in the middle of it.

Drama.title: The Way Back
Drama.description: Four-time Oscar nominee Ed Harris, Jim Sturgess and Oscar nominee Saoirse Ronan and Colin Farrell star in this epic saga of survival from six-time Oscar-nominee Peter Weir. Inspired by an incredible true story.

Drama.title: We Are What We Are
Drama.description: In this riveting horror-thriller, a family of cannibals takes extreme measures to find their next meal.

Drama.title: We Die Young
Drama.description: Lucas, a 14-year-old boy inducted into the gang life in Washington D.C., is determined that his 10-year-old brother won't follow the same path. When an Afghanistan war veteran comes into the neighborhood, an opportunity arises.

Drama.title: We Have a Pope
Drama.description: A comic and fictional exploration of the emotional struggles of a newly-elected pope coming to terms with the demands of his position.

Drama.title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
Drama.description: Tilda Swinton stars in this taut psychological thriller as Eva, whose relationship with her son Kevin has been difficult from the beginning. When his cruel streak erupts into violence, Eva wonders how much blame she deserves for his actions.

Drama.title: Weightless
Drama.description: An emotionally troubled man is forced to care for the obese 10-year-old son he has never met. Together they embark on a high-stakes journey to determine their future together, even as the world tries to tear them apart.

Drama.title: Welcome to the Rileys
Drama.description: Seeking refuge from his grief and crumbling marriage, a salesman (James Gandolfini) becomes a surrogate father to an underage stripper (Kristen Stewart).

Drama.title: What They Had
Drama.description: Bridget (Hilary Swank) returns home at her brother’s (Michael Shannon) urging to deal with her ailing mother (Blythe Danner) and her father’s (Robert Forster) reluctance to let go of their life together.

Drama.title: Where Hands Touch
Drama.description: When the daughter of a white German mother and an African father meets a member of the Hitler Youth - compulsory for all Aryan boys in 1944 Germany, they must battle against the fates laid out before them during the most brutal of times.

Drama.title: Where We Go from Here
Drama.description: Three acts of terror disrupt ordinary lives. A teacher dealing with domestic abuse finds even greater violence at school. Two lovers drifting apart may be separated by the hate of another. And, friends on a night out are caught up in brutal madness

Drama.title: White Night Wedding
Drama.description: In this uproarious comedy, a middle-aged professor has some second thoughts about marrying a woman half his age.

Drama.title: Wild Card
Drama.description: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss

Drama.title: Wild Rose
Drama.description: WILD ROSE tells the complicated story of musician Rose-Lynn, a woman from Scotland who is on a quest to become a country music star, while also grappling with the responsibilities of being recently released from prison and a young mother.

Drama.title: Woman at War
Drama.description: Halla declares a one-woman-war on the local aluminum industry. But as she prepares to abandon her role as environmental activist to become a mother, she decides to plot one final attack to deal the aluminum industry a crippling blow.

Drama.title: Wonder
Drama.description: Julia Roberts, Owen Wilson, and Jacob Tremblay star in an inspiring story of a loving family whose son, born with facial differences, enters a mainstream school for the first time.

Drama.title: xx/xy
Drama.description: A man finds himself having to decide between one of two women, not once, but twice. This drama stars Mark Ruffalo and was nominated for the Grand Jury Prize at Sundance.

Drama.title: A Year Ago in Winter
Drama.description: When a seductive and beautiful ballerina poses for a painter, the lines between friendship, love and attraction become dangerously blurred.

Drama.title: The Year of Spectacular Men
Drama.description: Izzy has a bad case of pre-real-world millennial-itis. She falls in and out of some not so romantic romances, and figures out that when it totally feels like the end of your story, it’s often just the beginning.

Drama.title: The Yellow Handkerchief
Drama.description: A road trip through Louisiana transforms three strangers who were originally brought together by their respective feelings of loneliness.

Drama.title: You Laugh But It's True
Drama.description: In the world of stand-up comedy in South Africa, Trevor Noah uses his experiences during Apartheid to prepare for the biggest show of his life.

Drama.title: Young & Beautiful
Drama.description: Acclaimed director François Ozon (Swimming Pool, 8 Women) helms this erotic tale of sexual awakening. After losing her virginity, 17-year-old budding beauty Isabelle (Marine Vacth) takes up a secret life as a call girl, meeting her older gentlemen clients for erotic hotel room trysts. Throughout, she remains curiously aloof, showing little interest in the encounters themselves or the money she makes, while Ozon slyly refrains from offering easy answers. As the enigmatic Isabelle, Marine Vacth is magnetic, delivering a star-making breakout performance in this sleek and sexy coming-of-age drama.

Family.title: 12 Dog Days Till Christmas
Family.description: A troubled teen sentenced to community service at a dog shelter helps find homes for unadopted strays and, in the process, discovers romance, family, and responsibility for himself.

Family.title: A 2nd Chance
Family.description: A young girl and her coach overcome adversity to make their way into the National Gymnastics Competition.

Family.title: A.R.C.H.I.E. 2: Mission Impawsible
Family.description: In this outrageous family comedy-adventure, Michael J. Fox plays Archie, a flying, talking robot dog who becomes a big-top star when his owner runs away to join the circus.

Family.title: Against the Wild 2: Survive the Serengeti
Family.description: After a plane crash, siblings Ryan and Emma find themselves stranded in the Serengeti. Along with a dog named Chinook, they must work together to survive in the untamed wilderness.

Family.title: Albert
Family.description: Albert, a little Douglas fir tree who loves Christmas more than anyone, goes on a road trip from his little nursery to the big city to make his dreams come true.

Family.title: Angels in the Snow
Family.description: The dysfunctional Montgomery family go to their cabin for Christmas where a blizzard traps them inside. When the Tucker family arrives needing shelter, they are welcomed inside and remind the Montgomery family how to love each other.

Family.title: Antz
Family.description: A small worker ant switch places with a soldier ant to win the heart of the beautiful princess. A comedy-adventure featuring Sharon Stone, Sylvester Stallone and Woody Allen.

Family.title: Barbie & Her Sisters in The Great Puppy Adventure
Family.description: Barbie™, her sisters, and their adorable new puppy pals find unexpected mystery and adventure while searching for long-lost treasure in their hometown of Willows.

Family.title: Barbie and the Three Musketeers
Family.description: It’s “all for one and one for all” in this action-filled adventure as Barbie stars as Corinne, a young country girl headed to Paris to pursue her big dream – to become a musketeer!

Family.title: Barbie in A Christmas Carol
Family.description: Barbie™ stars in her first holiday movie in this heart-warming adaptation of the classic Dickens story filled with cherished Christmas carols, fabulous fashions and lots of laughs!

Family.title: Barbie in a Mermaid Tale 2
Family.description: Surf’s up for Barbie™ as she returns as Merliah™, the surfing champ who’s also a mermaid princess, in this new sea-quel™ where she learns anything is possible when you stay true to yourself!

Family.title: Barbie: A Perfect Christmas
Family.description: Join Barbie™ and her sisters in this heartwarming, musical adventure where they discover what truly makes A Perfect Christmas – being together!

Family.title: Barbie: Mariposa & her Butterfly Fairy Friends
Family.description: Join Barbie™ in an all-new world of Butterfly Fairies! When the Queen falls ill, it's up to brave Mariposa™ and her friends to journey beyond the safe borders of the city to find a cure.

Family.title: Barbie: The Pearl Princess
Family.description: Join Lumina, the Mermaid princess, and her best friend Kuda, a pink sea horse, as she calls on her magical pearl powers for an unforgettable adventure in a beautiful mermaid world!

Family.title: Bernie the Dolphin
Family.description: In this heartwarming family adventure, the search for a missing dolphin leads two kids to uncover a real-estate development plan that endangers the sea life on a Florida beach.

Family.title: Big Time Movie
Family.description: Big Time Rush is off to London on their first world tour, but as soon as they arrive they're mixed up in a mission to save the world. With their bags switched at their airport, the boys are stuck with a fearsome device that could destroy the world.

Family.title: Billboard Dad
Family.description: Two sisters (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) print a personals ad on a billboard to find a match for their newly single father.

Family.title: Blurt
Family.description: Nice guy Jeremy (Jace Norman) loses his ability to keep his thoughts to himself and can't help but say everything out loud. The only way to fix his problem will be the hardest thing he'll have to do: win the school election.

Family.title: A Boy Named Charlie Brown
Family.description: Charlie Brown, Snoopy and the Peanuts gang in their feature film debut! Charlie has a chance to win the respect of his friends when he enters a school spelling bee and winds up in the big city for the finals.

Family.title: Catching Faith
Family.description: Alexa Taylor has a seemingly perfect life: Her daughter is an excellent student and her son is a star football player. But when things go wrong and friends turn their backs, Alexa learns that faith and family matters most.

Family.title: Charlotte's Web
Family.description: Miracles do happen! E.B. White's timeless children's story comes to life in this colorful animated musical. You'll laugh and sing along as Charlotte the Spider teaches Wilbur the Pig, Templeton the Rat and the other barnyard animal lessons on friendship, trust and love.

Family.title: Chicken Run
Family.description: The creators of Wallace & Gromit bring you an exciting story about a group of chickens led by Rocky (Mel Gibson) who are determined to fly the coop–even if they can’t fly!

Family.title: Christmas Belle
Family.description: It's "Beauty and the Beast" for Christmas when auctioneer Belle goes to catalog and finalize Hunter's estate sale. Hunter begins to soften as they work together, though, putting both the estate sale and Belle's heart in jeopardy.

Family.title: Christmas With the Andersons
Family.description: The Anderson family always goes all out for Christmas, but this year will be different when Michael loses his job just before the holidays. With wacky Aunt Katie visiting, though, she helps remind them Christmas can be fun with no money.

Family.title: Curious George
Family.description: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey, an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

Family.title: Curious George 3: Back to the Jungle
Family.description: Curious George goes on an epic adventure to space that crash lands in the jungles of Africa leading to an unforgettable journey with some new animal friends.

Family.title: Curious George: A Halloween Boo Fest
Family.description: A Fun-Filled Halloween Adventure! Hang on to your hats and get ready for a spook-tacular good time with Curious George - in his first-ever Halloween movie. Autumn is here, bringing colorful leaves, hay rides, pumpkin patches, and the annual Boo Festival. After hearing about a legendary scarecrow who steals hats, the inquisitive monkey and his friends set out to find him. By the time George gets to the festival, he realizes that it's not always easy to pick the perfect pumpkin, and that winning the prize for best costume may be as difficult as catching the mysterious scarecrow. Curious George: A Halloween Boo Fest - it's a bewitching treat for the whole family!

Family.title: Curious George: A Very Monkey Christmas
Family.description: George and The Man in The Yellow Hat are having a merry time counting down to Christmas. But neither can decide what to give each other. Will they find the answers before Christmas morning?

Family.title: Curious George: Royal Monkey
Family.description: Join your favorite monkey as he takes on his most regal role yet, trading places with a royal monkey!

Family.title: Dangerous Curves
Family.description: A young man charged with delivering a billionaire's Porsche takes an ill-advised side trip and winds up in deep trouble.

Family.title: Deck the Halls
Family.description: Holly (Gabrielle Carteris, Beverly Hills, 90210) returns to her hometown with her eight-year old son, Ben, to work for her father's toy business. Soon after, Ben watches a man (Steve Bacic, Big Love) move in next door with a sleigh, red suit, and lots of Christmas goodies. Ben begins to believe that their new neighbor is Santa Claus, and devises a plan to set up his mom with Santa Claus.

Family.title: Dive Olly Dive and the Octopus Rescue
Family.description: When Charley the Octopus inadvertently enters a “Star Finder” variety show and boogies himself to fame and fortune, it’s not all it's cracked up to be and it’s down to our heroes Olly and Beth to daringly rescue their friend.

Family.title: Double, Double, Toil and Trouble
Family.description: Determined twins (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) try to trick an evil aunt (Cloris Leachman) out of a magic moonstone and save their family home.

Family.title: Dr. Seuss: Dr. Seuss on the Loose
Family.description: Dr. Seuss on the Loose, a trilogy of allegorical classics by the world's best-known author of books for children: The Sneetches, The Zax and Green Eggs and Ham comprises the newest half-hour animated cartoon special written by Theodor Geisel.

Family.title: Dr. Seuss: The Cat in the Hat
Family.description: Two children left home alone for a short while one afternoon are visited by a very interesting yet troublesome cat wearing a tall striped hat. The cat succeeds in creating a huge mess in their house - can they get it cleaned up before Mom gets home?

Family.title: Dr. Seuss: The Lorax
Family.description: A ruined industrialist tells his tale of his environmentally self-destructive greed despite the warnings of an old forest creature.

Family.title: El Camino Hacia El Dorado
Family.description: Al desembarcar en las playas de El Dorado, Tulio, Miguel son confundidos con dioses y son adorados con riquezas. Deben decidir entre huir con el oro o  salvar a los pobladores de El Dorado.

Family.title: El Príncipe de Egipto
Family.description: Dos hermanos, uno nacido de la realeza y el otro huérfano con un pasado secreto, crecieron como los mejores amigos, pero cuando sus vidas toman un rumbo distinto surge una fuerte enemistad.

Family.title: Escape from Mr. Lemoncello's Library
Family.description: When twelve lucky kids win an invitation into legendary gamemaker Lemoncello's extraordinary, high-tech library, they have no idea what's in store. By navigating an elaborate scavenger hunt, they must compete to be the first to find their way out. Rating: TV-G

Family.title: Eve's Christmas
Family.description: On Christmas Eve, a high-powered executive's guardian angel offers her a chance to live her life again with a different spin.

Family.title: Every Other Holiday
Family.description: A young divorced mom takes her ex-husband home for the holidays to fulfill the one Christmas wish of her children, but finds herself caught between her protective mother and the ex she discovers she still loves.

Family.title: A Fairly Odd Movie: Grow Up, Timmy Turner!
Family.description: Perpetual fifth-grader Timmy Turner, 23, has tried everything to stay a kid and keep his fairy Godparents. But will he grow up at last and save Dimmsdale, or will he stay a kid forever? Find out in A Fairly Odd Movie: Grow Up, Timmy Turner! Rating: TV-PG

Family.title: A Fairly Odd Summer
Family.description: When the source of all fairy magic, the Abracadabrium, accidentally falls into the wrong hands, it's up to Timmy, Tootie, Marty, and Mitzy to get it back and save the fairies in this live action Hawaiian adventure filled with lots of fairly odd madness!

Family.title: The Festive Menace
Family.description: After Santa Claus is accidently zapped by Bubbles’ invention – the ‘Naughty/Nice’ machine – Christmas Eve is thrown into chaos.  It’s up to the Oddbods to rally together and reverse the effects in order to save Santa and more importantly… Christmas Day!

Family.title: Flight of the Red Balloon
Family.description: A boy is followed by a mysterious balloon around Paris, a city that has never looked so beautiful as when shot by the world's most lauded director, Hou Hsiao Hsien.

Family.title: Free Willy
Family.description: When maladjusted orphan Jesse (Jason James Richter) vandalizes a theme park, he is placed with foster parents and must work at the park to make amends. There he meets Willy, a young Orca whale who has been separated from his family. Sensing kinship, they form a bond and, with the help of kindly whale trainer Rae Lindley (Lori Petty), develop a routine of tricks. However, greedy park owner Dial (Michael Ironside) soon catches wind of the duo and makes plans to profit from them.

Family.title: Free Willy 2: The Adventure Home
Family.description: It's been two years since a brave 12-year-old boy rescued a majestic orca whale named Willy, but their reunion is marred when an oil spill threatens Willy's pod.

Family.title: Free Willy 3: The Rescue
Family.description: A 10-year-old boy whose father is running an illegal whaling operation is caught in a dilemma when Willy and his pod are threatened.

Family.title: Furry Vengeance
Family.description: A developer building a subdivision in Oregon is opposed by a critter army.

Family.title: The Heart of Christmas
Family.description: Megan (Candace Cameron Bure) re-examines her priorities after she sees people decorating for Christmas in October to help a family celebrate Christmas with their dying son.

Family.title: Hey Arnold! The Jungle Movie
Family.description: Arnold and his class win a service trip to San Lorenzo. But when their trip takes a turn for the worst, their only hope of getting home may be retracing the dangerous path that led to Arnold's parents' disappearance.

Family.title: His and Her Christmas
Family.description: A chance meeting between rival newspaper journalists with rival Christmas columns is an epic disaster--and maybe love at first sight.

Family.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
Family.description: On his first day at a new school, eleven-year-old Billy goes up against the school bully in a challenge that ends up with a total gross-out date...to eat 10 worms in one day!

Family.title: How to Train Your Dragon: Snoggletog Log
Family.description: Come settle by the warmth of a roaring fire in Hiccup & Astrid's home. You never know who is going to stop by for a sip of Yak Nog!

Family.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
Family.description: When the appearance of a Light Fury dragon coincides with the darkest threat they have faced, Hiccup and Toothless must journey to a hidden world and discover their destinies.

Family.title: Jorge el Curioso
Family.description: Llega tu monito favorito, Jorge el Curioso, en ¡una nueva película animada! Descubre cómo Jorge el Curioso, el monito más aventurero, encuentra al Hombre del Sombrero Amarillo, y le sigue hasta la gran ciudad.

Family.title: Jorge el Curioso 3: De regreso a la Jungla
Family.description: El juramento reciente de Ted de “cero aventuras con monos” se pone en tela de duda cuando le ofrecen una misión espacial a Jorge. El preocupado Ted busca a Jorge después de su aterrizaje forzoso en África.

Family.title: Jorge el Curioso: El Festival de Halloween
Family.description: ¡Una divertidísima aventura de Halloween! Agárrate el sombrero y prepárate para una pasarla en grande con Jorge el Curioso en su primera película de Halloween.

Family.title: Jorge el Curioso: Una Navidad de Monos
Family.description: Jorge y el hombre del sombrero amarillo la están pasando muy bien contando los días que faltan para Navidad. Solo hay un enigma: ninguno de los dos sabe qué regalarle al otro.

Family.title: Kirk Cameron's Saving Christmas
Family.description: Kirk Cameron's Saving Christmas is a story that provides a biblical basis for our time-honored celebrations and the inspiration to stand strongly against a culture that wants to eliminate the faith elements of the holy season

Family.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
Family.description: Shortly after a tornado rips through her Kansas home, Dorothy returns to Oz to save her friends from a villainous jester.

Family.title: Luis and the Aliens
Family.description: 12-year-old Luis befriends a trio of awkward aliens who’ve gotten stuck on Earth after watching too much home-shopping network. With a neglectful father at home, Luis decides to escape with the aliens so he can avoid being sent away to a boarding school.

Family.title: The Magic Hockey Skates
Family.description: Pint sized nine year old Joey has one dream - to be a Hockey Champion. Joey believes that brand new Rocky Rockets Skates will help him achieve his dream, but to his dismay his Father can only afford some beaten up second hand skates.

Family.title: Monsters at Large
Family.description: In this spooky family comedy, a teen task force that fights imaginary monsters finds itself face to face with the real thing. But you’ll be laughing too hard to be scared!

Family.title: Monsters vs. Aliens
Family.description: A nearly 50-foot tall woman leads a gaggle of other 1950s throwback monsters into battle against an alien menace in this animated comedy.

Family.title: My Dad is Scrooge
Family.description: The animals of Woodsley Farm help Oliver and his little sister shock their Dad into embracing the holiday spirit while trying to save the farm.

Family.title: My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow
Family.description: The Rainbow Celebration is almost near as everyone in Ponyville prepares and awaits the first rainbow of the season.

Family.title: My Little Pony: A Very Minty Christmas
Family.description: Clumsy Minty Pony (Tabitha St. Germain) breaks the holiday candy cane that guides Santa Claus to Ponyville every year; includes bonus episode "Dancing in the Clouds."

Family.title: My Little Pony: The Princess Promenade
Family.description: The ponies' annual Spring Promenade goes awry when a 1,000-year-old dragon awakens and fulfills a royal prophecy.

Family.title: My Little Pony: Twinkle Wish Adventure
Family.description: All the ponies cannot wait for the Winter Wishes festival where the Wishing Star grants each pony one special wish. But when the Wishing Star disappears, they go on a journey to find it. But will they make it back in time for the festival?

Family.title: My Santa
Family.description: Single mother Jen dislikes the holidays, but she starts to rediscover the magic of Christmas after meeting a handsome mall Santa, Chris. Jen is unaware that Chris is actually the son of the real Santa, on a mission to find his Mrs. Claus.

Family.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
Family.description: National Lampoon's Vacation (1983) stars Chevy Chase and Beverly D'Angelo. The Griswolds (Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo) and family head by station wagon for the California fun park Walley World.

Family.title: Party Monsters
Family.description: Marv the magician unleashes a powerful spell cursing the Oddbods and turning them into their actual Halloween costume monsters. It’s up to Slick, as Sherlock Holmes, to save the day, and track down werewolves, witches and a ketchup obsessed vampire.

Family.title: The Pink Panther 2
Family.description: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Family.title: Pinocchio (2012)
Family.description: In this dazzling, delightful reimagining of the classic family legend, a playful puppet comes to life and experiences incredible adventures in his struggle to become human.

Family.title: The Pirates! Band Of Misfits
Family.description: Set sail for a fun-filled pirate adventure with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas!

Family.title: The Polar Express
Family.description: Late on Christmas Eve, after the town has gone to sleep, a boy boards the mysterious train that waits for him--The Polar Express.

Family.title: Pollitos En Fuga
Family.description: Mientras que las gallinas de la granja de la malévola Sra. Tweedy sueñan con una mejor vida, una astuta gallina llamada Ginger está empollando un plan para volar del nido, ¡para siempre!

Family.title: The Prince of Egypt
Family.description: An epic adventure of two brothers- one the ruler of a powerful empire and the other the chosen leader of his people. Their final confrontation will forever change the world.

Family.title: Racetime
Family.description: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

Family.title: Red Dog: True Blue
Family.description: When eleven-year-old Mick is shipped off to his grandfather's cattle station in the remote Pilbara region of Western Australia, he prepares himself for a life of dull hardship

Family.title: The Road to El Dorado
Family.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Family.title: Robo-Dog
Family.description: Tom Austin creates the most incredible canine the world has ever seen! But Tom's ex-boss Mr. Willis, finds out that Robo-Dog is powered by a technologically advanced super battery, and he plots to steal it for himself.

Family.title: Robo-Dog: Airborne
Family.description: When a cool, cuddly, robotic dog runs off and has his memory chip erased, a clever boy and genius creator-dad must track down the perfect pooch and bring him home.

Family.title: Rodeo & Juliet
Family.description: A city girl is forced to go to the country where she meets a special horse and a young cowboy who teaaches her to barrel race while her mother reconnects with her former fiancé.

Family.title: Sabrina Down Under
Family.description: Sabrina aspires to learn about marine biology; when she discovers that the island's marine mammals are falling ill, including a handsome merman and his mermaid sister, she takes up an ecological cause on behalf of all of the inhabitants of the sea.

Family.title: Santa Hunters
Family.description: Alex is on a mission to prove Santa is real. With the help of his family and some elaborate traps, they catch the big guy in action. But when they realize Santa is losing his magic they must find a way to restore it before they destroy Christmas!

Family.title: Saving Christmas
Family.description: A boy attempts to scientifically prove Santa's existence.

Family.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
Family.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

Family.title: Sherlock Gnomes
Family.description: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo & Juliet, recruit renown detective, Sherlock Gnomes, to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

Family.title: Snoopy Come Home
Family.description: This charming Peanuts feature centers around the world's most independent pooch. Snoopy leaves Charlie Brown to visit his former owner Lila in the hospital, then returns with her to her apartment house.

Family.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
Family.description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

Family.title: So This Is Christmas
Family.description: Eighteen-year-old Ashley's life is headed in the wrong direction. She's been hanging out with a bad crowd and seeking an escape from the drama at home.

Family.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Family.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

Family.title: The Spy Next Door
Family.description: Jackie Chan is a former superspy who wants to settle down with his girlfriend, but first has to battle Russian terrorists.

Family.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
Family.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Family.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
Family.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Family.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
Family.description: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy.

Family.title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
Family.description: The crews of the Enterprise and the Excelsior must stop a plot to prevent a peace treaty between the Klingon Empire and the Federation.

Family.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
Family.description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of the federation plot against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Capt. Picard begins an open rebellion.

Family.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
Family.description: This first Star Trek film reunites the U.S.S. Enterprise's original crew. Capt. James T. Kirk now an admiral, and his crew must save humanity from an alien ship steadily approaching Earth and destroying everything in its path.

Family.title: Step Dogs
Family.description: Two very different dogs move into together when their owners get married. But when thieves try to break into their house, these four-legged foes must team up to defend their home.

Family.title: The Swan Princess
Family.description: From the director of The Fox and the Hound comes THE SWAN PRINCESS, a magical animated adventure (based on the classic fairytale SWAN LAKE) that has captured the hearts of audiences around the world!

Family.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle
Family.description: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

Family.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
Family.description: Shortly after the Royal Family adopts a young girl named Alise, she is taken away into the forest. Princess Odette, Derek and their woodland friends, must work together to find a way to bring her home to the castle.

Family.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today
Family.description: With her parents away for the summer, fun-loving, young Princess Alise must spend her time with Queen Uberta, training to be the perfect, proper royal. But what she really wants is to become a swashbuckling pirate!

Family.title: The Swan Princess: Royally Undercover
Family.description: When mysterious visitors arrive in the Kingdom, Princess Alise, Lucas and their friends go undercover on a secret spy adventure.

Family.title: The Tayo Movie: Mission Ace
Family.description: Duri is on board while Tayo is doing his route. He shows Tayo his most favorite toy car, ‘Ace’. Tayo envies Duri and Ace’s strong connection. As soon as Duri gets out at his stop, he ends up dropping Ace on the road by accident.

Family.title: Teen Spirit
Family.description: Violet (Elle Fanning) is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

Family.title: Terrific Trucks Save Christmas
Family.description: The team saves the town after a threat to the Christmas Tree Celebration.

Family.title: Tiny Christmas
Family.description: On Christmas Eve, a clumsy elf accidentally shrinks two kids into mini-size. The kids are scooped up into Santa's sack and dropped off across the street. To make it home for Christmas (just one house away!), the tiny kids have to work together.  Rating: TV-G

Family.title: Turtle Tale
Family.description: This uproarious family adventure follows two mismatched turtles who joke and bicker as they search for their friend, who vanished from a Florida animal park.

Family.title: Urban Country
Family.description: Faith, a troubled 18-year-old city girl, moves to a horse ranch in the country to help her sick mother. While there, Faith learns to embrace the country lifestyle and the importance of family, hard work and helping others.

Family.title: A Very Brady Christmas
Family.description: Deck the halls with love and laughter as the Brady Bunch comes home for Christmas! Mike, Carol and the whole gang are back, in a warm and wonderful two hour special featuring all of the characters from the popular series - plus their new families.

Family.title: Zapped
Family.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

Family.title: Zee Force Five
Family.description: While Zee is forced to work as Bubble’s lab assistant, he gets his hands on her cloning machine.  Trying to get out of his duties, he uses the device and creates an exact replica of himself.  Chaos ensues when the lazy clone decides to clone himself.

History.title: The 12th Man
History.description: Nazis hunt for a lone surviving saboteur in this edge-of-your-seat WWII thriller based on a true-life story. Jonathan Rhys-Meyers stars.

History.title: Air Strike
History.description: Starring Bruce Willis and Adrien Brody and featuring thrilling dogfight action, this intense epic portrays China's brave battle to stop the Japanese bomber strikes of WWII.

History.title: Anthropoid
History.description: Based  on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich’s third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

History.title: Bolden
History.description: BOLDEN imagines the compelling, powerful and tragic journey of Buddy Bolden, the unsung American hero who invented Jazz.

History.title: BPM (Beats Per Minute)
History.description: Nathan is a young man who joins an AIDS activist group in 1990s Paris. As he attends the weekly meetings, he learns that some members prefer a more radical approach to their protests.

History.title: The Childhood of a Leader
History.description: Robert Pattinson and Bérénice Bejo lead a powerhouse cast in this dark coming-of-age story in which a Hitler-esque dictator is born amid the rising tide of fascism.

History.title: The Cokeville Miracle
History.description: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

History.title: The Conspirator
History.description: Abraham Lincoln's assassination is viewed from the perspective of the lone female conspirator charged in the case.

History.title: The Duchess of Langeais
History.description: Antoinette (Balibara) is the Duchess, a married coquette who frequents the most extravagant balls in 1820's Paris during The Restoration. Hypocrisy and vanity reign. Handsome general Armand de Montriveau (Guillaume Depardieu) feels true love upon first meeting the Duchess. Flattered, the alluring Antoinette orchestrates a calculated game of seduction, but repeatedly refuses the general. Despite his sincere romantic declarations, Montriveau's passion remains unfulfilled. When he eventually seeks revenge, Antoinette's love awakens. But it may well be too late for the star-crossed lovers.

History.title: Embrace of the Serpent
History.description: At once blistering and poetic, the ravages of colonialism cast a dark shadow over the South American landscape in EMBRACE OF THE SERPENT, the third feature by Ciro Guerra. Filmed in stunning black-and-white, SERPENT centers on Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and the last survivor of his people, and the two scientists who, over the course of 40 years, build a friendship with him. The film was inspired by the real-life journals of two explorers (Theodor Koch-Grünberg and Richard Evans Schultes) who traveled through the Colombian Amazon during the last century in search of the sacred and difficult-to-find psychedelic Yakruna plant. 2016 Academy Award Nominee - Best Foreign Language Film

History.title: Experimenter
History.description: Yale University, 1961. Stanley Milgram (Peter Sarsgaard) designs a psychology experiment that remains relevant to this day, in which people think they’re delivering painful electric shocks to an affable stranger (Jim Gaffigan) strapped into a chair in another room. Disregarding his pleas for mercy, the majority of subjects do not stop the experiment, administering what they think are near-fatal electric shots, simply because they’ve been told to. Milgram’s exploration of authority and conformity strikes a nerve in popular culture and the scientific community. Celebrated in some circles, he is also accused of being a deceptive, manipulative monster. His wife Sasha (Winona Ryder) anchors him through it all.

History.title: The Girl King
History.description: Sweden’s Queen Kristina, a flamboyant and unpredictable woman who ascended the throne at age six, was raised as a prince and strived to bring peace and education to her country—all while pursuing an illicit romance with her female royal attendant.

History.title: Kinsey
History.description: Liam Neeson stars in this critically acclaimed drama that details Professor Alfred Kinsey's groundbreaking work on human sexual behavior.

History.title: Loving Vincent
History.description: Mystery surrounds the death of famed painter Vincent van Gogh in 1890 France.

History.title: Mad to Be Normal
History.description: Scottish psychiatrist R.D. Laing performs various daring experiments on people who were diagnosed as mentally disturbed.

History.title: Nico, 1988
History.description: Nico, 1988 is the story of an artist, a mother, and the woman behind the icon. Approaching 50, Nico's life and career are on the ropes, a far cry from her glamorous days as a Warhol superstar and celebrated vocalist for The Velvet Underground.

History.title: Nina
History.description: Nina Simone (Zoe Saldana) was one of the century’s most extraordinary talents, but fame and fortune came with a price. Rediscovering the meaning of her life and work took courage, strength and one true friend: Clifton Henderson (David Oyelowo).

History.title: Operation Finale
History.description: This thrilling true story follows the 1960 covert mission of legendary Mossad agent Peter Malkin as he infiltrates Argentina and captures Adolf Eichmann.

History.title: The Pagan King
History.description: On his deathbed, the reigning king bestows power to an unexpected heir who must find strength within himself to unite his people against the violent crusades which threaten their freedom.

History.title: Pawn Sacrifice
History.description: American chess legend Bobby Fischer (Tobey Maguire) and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) enthrall the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

History.title: Pilgrimage
History.description: Leaving his Irish monastery for the first time, a young novice departs with a devoted group of monks and a mysterious former Crusader as they attempt to transport a holy relic to Rome.

History.title: The Princess of Montpensier
History.description: The life of a ravishing young princess is torn apart by lust and forbidden desire, in this epic period drama.

History.title: Professor Marston and the Wonder Women
History.description: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his polyamorous relationship with his wife and his mistress who would inspire his creation of the superheroine, Wonder Woman.

History.title: A Taxi Driver
History.description: In this powerful drama based on a true story, a down-on-his-luck taxi driver hired by a foreign journalist finds himself in a life-or-death struggle in the midst of the Gwangju Uprising.

History.title: The Time That Remains
History.description: A vividly entertaining and moving drama about one family's courageous fight for survival in war-torn Israel.

History.title: Tom of Finland
History.description: Finnish artist Touko Laaksonen becomes famous for his homoerotic works.

History.title: Walking With the Enemy
History.description: During World War II, a young Hungarian (Jonas Armstrong) disguises himself as a Nazi officer to save his family and thousands of his countrymen from the death camps. Meanwhile, Hungary's regent (Ben Kingsley) takes great risks to save his country.

History.title: Where Hands Touch
History.description: When the daughter of a white German mother and an African father meets a member of the Hitler Youth - compulsory for all Aryan boys in 1944 Germany, they must battle against the fates laid out before them during the most brutal of times.

Horror.title: 11 Minutes
Horror.description: The fates of several people collide over the course of 11 cataclysmic minutes in this stylish roller coaster of a thriller that sprints breathlessly towards a stunning climax.

Horror.title: 28 Days Later
Horror.description: A deadly virus transforms humans into bloodthirsty, rage-filled zombies that leave a handful of survivors on the run for their lives.

Horror.title: The Alchemist Cookbook
