Kids.description: Marv the magician unleashes a powerful spell cursing the Oddbods and turning them into their actual Halloween costume monsters. It’s up to Slick, as Sherlock Holmes, to save the day, and track down werewolves, witches and a ketchup obsessed vampire.

Kids.title: Passport to Paris
Kids.description: Eager to see Paris but tired of their chaperon, identical twins (Ashley Olsen, Mary-Kate Olsen) tour France with two French teenagers.

Kids.title: Pegasus: Pony with a Broken Wing
Kids.description: When tween girl Sydney and a neighbor boy find a mysterious pony with an injured wing, they secretly heal the creature while racing to save Sydney’s family ranch from developers.

Kids.title: The Pink Panther 2
Kids.description: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Kids.title: Pinocchio (2012)
Kids.description: In this dazzling, delightful reimagining of the classic family legend, a playful puppet comes to life and experiences incredible adventures in his struggle to become human.

Kids.title: The Pirates! Band Of Misfits
Kids.description: Set sail for a fun-filled pirate adventure with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas!

Kids.title: Pixi Saves Christmas
Kids.description: For centuries, the many Christmas Genies of the world have worked together to bring magic and happiness to children. This year, however, former genie Monopolish is determined to become The One and Only Christmas Genie and launches a vicious attack on the secret Genies’ Forum. All hope for the survival of Christmas rests with Pixi Post, a lowly elf, who must use all her wits and skills to thwart his evil plan and save the most magical time of year.

Kids.title: Pokémon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
Kids.description: When Destruction rises, can Life prevail?

Kids.title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
Kids.description: Ash must help Hoopa overcome its own darkness!

Kids.title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
Kids.description: The Soul-Heart Calls…

Kids.title: The Polar Express
Kids.description: Late on Christmas Eve, after the town has gone to sleep, a boy boards the mysterious train that waits for him--The Polar Express.

Kids.title: Pollitos En Fuga
Kids.description: Mientras que las gallinas de la granja de la malévola Sra. Tweedy sueñan con una mejor vida, una astuta gallina llamada Ginger está empollando un plan para volar del nido, ¡para siempre!

Kids.title: The Prince of Egypt
Kids.description: An epic adventure of two brothers- one the ruler of a powerful empire and the other the chosen leader of his people. Their final confrontation will forever change the world.

Kids.title: Racetime
Kids.description: After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

Kids.title: Rags
Kids.description: A boy Cinderella story with a hip-hop attitude. Charlie is a teenager with dreams of leaving his life sweeping floors for music stardom. Kadee Worth is at the top of the charts, but is caged by her record executive father. Rating: TV-G

Kids.title: Rango
Kids.description: A chameleon that aspires to be a swashbuckling hero finds himself in a Western town plagued by bandits and is forced to literally play the role in order to protect it.

Kids.title: Red Dog: True Blue
Kids.description: When eleven-year-old Mick is shipped off to his grandfather's cattle station in the remote Pilbara region of Western Australia, he prepares himself for a life of dull hardship

Kids.title: Regular Show: The Movie
Kids.description: After accidentally creating a Timenado, two slacker groundskeepers have to go back in time and battle an evil volleyball coach in order to save the universe...and their friendship.

Kids.title: The Road to El Dorado
Kids.description: When treasure hunters, Tulio (Kevin Kline) and Miguel (Kenneth Branagh) are mistaken for gods, they face a difficult decision: keep the riches or battle the odds to save El Dorado!

Kids.title: Robo-Dog
Kids.description: Tom Austin creates the most incredible canine the world has ever seen! But Tom's ex-boss Mr. Willis, finds out that Robo-Dog is powered by a technologically advanced super battery, and he plots to steal it for himself.

Kids.title: Robo-Dog: Airborne
Kids.description: When a cool, cuddly, robotic dog runs off and has his memory chip erased, a clever boy and genius creator-dad must track down the perfect pooch and bring him home.

Kids.title: Santa Hunters
Kids.description: Alex is on a mission to prove Santa is real. With the help of his family and some elaborate traps, they catch the big guy in action. But when they realize Santa is losing his magic they must find a way to restore it before they destroy Christmas!

Kids.title: Saving Christmas
Kids.description: A boy attempts to scientifically prove Santa's existence.

Kids.title: The Secret of the Nutcracker
Kids.description: In this innovative version of the world famous Christmas story, 12-year-old Clara takes a magical journey on Christmas Eve to find her father in a World War II Prisoner of War camp.

Kids.title: Sheep and Wolves
Kids.description: In a magical land faraway lives a flock of carefree sheep. When their stress-free life is interrupted by a pack of wolves, the pack's favorite goofball, Grey, takes on the challenge of proving to everyone that he is a worthy leader.

Kids.title: Sherlock Gnomes
Kids.description: Garden gnomes, Gnomeo & Juliet, recruit renown detective, Sherlock Gnomes, to investigate the mysterious disappearance of other garden ornaments.

Kids.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
Kids.description: Sinbad the sailor must retrieve the stolen Book of Peace from a goddess with a penchant for chaos in this mythological animated tale.

Kids.title: Snoopy Come Home
Kids.description: This charming Peanuts feature centers around the world's most independent pooch. Snoopy leaves Charlie Brown to visit his former owner Lila in the hospital, then returns with her to her apartment house.

Kids.title: The Snow Queen 3: Fire and Ice
Kids.description: After heroically defeating both the Snow Queen and the Snow King, Gerda, a selfless adventurer, is struggling with the disappearance of her parents. In order to find them, Gerda and her friends go on a dangerous mission.

Kids.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
Kids.description: A wild horse yearns to be free after he is captured by a nasty U.S. colonel in this 2002 Oscar(R)-nominee for Best Animated Feature.

Kids.title: Splitting Adam
Kids.description: After stumbling across a cloning machine, Adam Baker creates multiple versions of himself and finds the answer to handling his many summer responsibilities! Rating: TV-G

Kids.title: The Spy Next Door
Kids.description: Jackie Chan is a former superspy who wants to settle down with his girlfriend, but first has to battle Russian terrorists.

Kids.title: Step Dogs
Kids.description: Two very different dogs move into together when their owners get married. But when thieves try to break into their house, these four-legged foes must team up to defend their home.

Kids.title: The Swan Princess
Kids.description: From the director of The Fox and the Hound comes THE SWAN PRINCESS, a magical animated adventure (based on the classic fairytale SWAN LAKE) that has captured the hearts of audiences around the world!

Kids.title: The Swan Princess and the Secret of the Castle
Kids.description: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

Kids.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
Kids.description: Princess Odette, Prince Derek and their trusted woodland friends return for their first Christmas celebration!  But, with the villainous Rothbart striving to destroy Christmas itself, will they be able to stop him and save the day? Told in beautiful CG animation for the very first time, The Swan Princess Christmas is an enchanting musical holiday treat the whole family will enjoy!

Kids.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
Kids.description: Shortly after the Royal Family adopts a young girl named Alise, she is taken away into the forest. Princess Odette, Derek and their woodland friends, must work together to find a way to bring her home to the castle.

Kids.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Myztery
Kids.description: Your favorite characters are back in an all-new royal adventure! It seems that a mysterious "Z" is appearing as a mark on the palace residents. Who is behind the mark and what does it mean?

Kids.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today
Kids.description: With her parents away for the summer, fun-loving, young Princess Alise must spend her time with Queen Uberta, training to be the perfect, proper royal. But what she really wants is to become a swashbuckling pirate!

Kids.title: The Swan Princess: Royally Undercover
Kids.description: When mysterious visitors arrive in the Kingdom, Princess Alise, Lucas and their friends go undercover on a secret spy adventure.

Kids.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
Kids.description: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

Kids.title: Swindle
Kids.description: Griffin Bing wants to swindle a swindler, right a wrong, take back property unethically obtained by deceptive means (whatever sounds fancier) and sets off to recruit the ultimate crew. He is owed favors all over school and it's time to call them in! Rating: TV-G

Kids.title: Switching Goals
Kids.description: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen executive produce and star in the rousing comedy of two sisters who hatch the ultimate scheme to find out how their other half lives--by Switching Goals.

Kids.title: The Tayo Movie: Mission Ace
Kids.description: Duri is on board while Tayo is doing his route. He shows Tayo his most favorite toy car, ‘Ace’. Tayo envies Duri and Ace’s strong connection. As soon as Duri gets out at his stop, he ends up dropping Ace on the road by accident.

Kids.title: Terrific Trucks Save Christmas
Kids.description: The team saves the town after a threat to the Christmas Tree Celebration.

Kids.title: Tiny Christmas
Kids.description: On Christmas Eve, a clumsy elf accidentally shrinks two kids into mini-size. The kids are scooped up into Santa's sack and dropped off across the street. To make it home for Christmas (just one house away!), the tiny kids have to work together.  Rating: TV-G

Kids.title: Tiny Toon Adventures: How I Spent My Vacation
Kids.description: School's out for summer, and hilarious times are ahead for the wild and wacky bunch in their anxiously awaited vacations. But who will create the most havoc? The only way to see who causes the most madness and mayhem is to watch!

Kids.title: Tiny Toon Adventures: Night Ghoulery
Kids.description: A framework that's more than slightly similar to Rod Serling's "Night Gallery" and several other tales of horror and hilarity with a typical Tiny Toons twist.

Kids.title: Tiny Toons Spring Break Special
Kids.description: Sun, sand and a wacky time are had by all when the Tiny Toons gang travels to Ft. Lauderdale, Florida, for a Tiny Toons' Spring Break. Elmyra believes that Buster is the Easter Bunny, Plucky's plans go awry, and the Tiny Toons meet Hamton's grandparents.

Kids.title: Turtle Tale
Kids.description: This uproarious family adventure follows two mismatched turtles who joke and bicker as they search for their friend, who vanished from a Florida animal park.

Kids.title: UglyDolls
Kids.description: An animated adventure in which the free-spirited UglyDolls confront what it means to be different, struggle with a desire to be loved, and ultimately discover who you truly are is what matters most.

Kids.title: Urban Country
Kids.description: Faith, a troubled 18-year-old city girl, moves to a horse ranch in the country to help her sick mother. While there, Faith learns to embrace the country lifestyle and the importance of family, hard work and helping others.

Kids.title: Wonder Park
Kids.description: Wonder Park tells the story of a magnificent amusement park where the imagination of a wildly creative girl named June comes alive.

Kids.title: Zapped
Kids.description: Zoey discovers a smartphone app that magically controls boys.

Kids.title: Zee Force Five
Kids.description: While Zee is forced to work as Bubble’s lab assistant, he gets his hands on her cloning machine.  Trying to get out of his duties, he uses the device and creates an exact replica of himself.  Chaos ensues when the lazy clone decides to clone himself.

Latino.title: Antz Hormiguitaz
Latino.description: La monótona vida de Z, una hormiga obrer, toma un giro emocionante cuando intercmbia funciones con su compañero Weaver, una hormiga guerrera. Z podría convertirse en el héroe más grande.

Latino.title: Asmodexia
Latino.description: An exorcist travels the countryside battling a mysterious cult and those afflicted with demonic possession in this supernatural thriller.

Latino.title: El Príncipe de Egipto
Latino.description: Dos hermanos, uno nacido de la realeza y el otro huérfano con un pasado secreto, crecieron como los mejores amigos, pero cuando sus vidas toman un rumbo distinto surge una fuerte enemistad.

Latino.title: The Oath en Espanol
Latino.description: Una polémica ley de la Casa Blanca produce un enfrentamiento politico entre los miembros de una misma familia en una salvaje y divertida comedia de humor negro, enseñándonos cómo sobrevivir el Día de Acción de Gracias en la era del tribalismo político.

Latino.title: Sidewalls
Latino.description: Martin and Mariana are destined for one another; they're passionate about the same subjects, love the same movies and enjoy the same hobbies—only they have yet to meet.

LGBTQ+.title: Adam (2019)
LGBTQ+.description: Directed by trans filmmaker Rhys Ernst, this adaptation tells the thought-provoking story of a cisgender male, who, after falling in love with a lesbian, goes on a journey of learning about LGBTQ culture.

LGBTQ+.title: All About E
LGBTQ+.description: A sexy young DJ, E, and her gay best friend, Matt, are forced to run when E stumbles on some cash. But E finds she has burnt too many bridges and there is nowhere to run but outback Australia into the arms of the ex-girlfriend, Trish, who broke her heart.

LGBTQ+.title: Assassination Nation
LGBTQ+.description: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

LGBTQ+.title: AWOL
LGBTQ+.description: Joey joins the Army as a way out of Pennsylvania coal country just as she falls in love with magnetic housewife Rayna. A splendid meditation on the boundless possibilities of first love constricted by the trials of poverty.

LGBTQ+.title: Beach Rats
LGBTQ+.description: BEACH RATS follows a teenage Frankie (Harris Dickinson) on the outer edges of Brooklyn as he struggles to reconcile his competing sexual desires, leaving him hurtling towards irreparable consequences.

LGBTQ+.title: BPM (Beats Per Minute)
LGBTQ+.description: Nathan is a young man who joins an AIDS activist group in 1990s Paris. As he attends the weekly meetings, he learns that some members prefer a more radical approach to their protests.

LGBTQ+.title: Cherry Pop
LGBTQ+.description: Cherry Pop, directed by Assaad Yacoub, follows one wild, crazy night at a drag club. The matriarch of the show Zaza refuses to come out of her dressing room, while a young newcomer, The Cherry, is tormented by the regular troupe of back-stabbing queens.

LGBTQ+.title: Do I Sound Gay?
LGBTQ+.description: What makes a voice "gay?" This witty, entertaining look at a controversial topic features candid interviews with Dan Savage, David Sedaris, George Takei, and Margaret Cho.

LGBTQ+.title: First Girl I Loved
LGBTQ+.description: In this Sundance award-winner, high-school misfit Anne falls in love with Sasha, the beautiful star of the softball team. When Anne tells her best friend Clifton about her new crush, his jealousy threatens more than just the girls' budding romance.

LGBTQ+.title: Freak Show
LGBTQ+.description: Billy Bloom is talented, fierce and fearless but does he have what it takes to win homecoming queen? Bette Midler, Abigail Breslin star in this fabulous comedy.

LGBTQ+.title: Getting Go: The Go Doc Project
LGBTQ+.description: After becoming infatuated with a hunky New York go-go dancer, college boy Doc devises a plan to get close to his crush by asking him to be the main subject in a makeshift documentary.

LGBTQ+.title: The Girl King
LGBTQ+.description: Sweden’s Queen Kristina, a flamboyant and unpredictable woman who ascended the throne at age six, was raised as a prince and strived to bring peace and education to her country—all while pursuing an illicit romance with her female royal attendant.

LGBTQ+.title: Henry Gamble's Birthday Party
LGBTQ+.description: Henry Gamble is turning 17 today. As Henry treads through various sexual possibilities trying to finally come into his own, so too do the adults and teenagers at the party.

LGBTQ+.title: Hot Guys with Guns
LGBTQ+.description: Chinatown meets Boystown when an aspiring actor and a grizzled detective team up in this modern take on the old-fashioned detective story.

LGBTQ+.title: Howl
LGBTQ+.description: James Franco delivers a career-defining performance as poet Allen Ginsberg. Through his search for personal and creative expression, Ginsberg writes HOWL, and must contend with attorney Jake Ehrlich (Jon Hamm) during HOWL'S bizarre obscenity trial.

LGBTQ+.title: Just Charlie
LGBTQ+.description: Young soccer star Charlie has the world at his feet. With a top club desperate to sign him, his future is seemingly mapped out. But the teenager sees only a nightmare. Trapped in the body of a boy, Charlie is torn between wanting to live up to her father’s expectations and shedding this ill-fitting skin. Charlie’s next move will tear the family apart and threaten everything they hold dear.

LGBTQ+.title: Kiki
LGBTQ+.description: 25 years after 'Paris Is Burning' introduced the art of voguing to the world, Kiki revisits New York City's thriving underground ballroom scene. It's a larger-than-life world in which LGBTQ youths of color are empowered by staging elaborate dance competitions that showcase their dynamic choreography, fabulous costumes, and fierce attitude. It's also a safe haven for struggling, at-risk teens who find acceptance, support, and friendship within the Kiki community. Granted intimate access to the scene, filmmaker Sara Jordenö introduces viewers to some of Kiki culture's most prominent personalities, going beyond the glamour of the balls to highlight the serious challenges facing queer black and Latino young people. Bringing together heartrending personal stories with incredible displays of creative expression, Kiki is 'exhilarating…an indelible, must-see ode to gay New York' (Manohla Dargis, The New York Times).

LGBTQ+.title: Liz in September
LGBTQ+.description: Every year, Liz, a hardcore party girl and womanizer, celebrates her birthday with her friends at a Caribbean beach retreat. This year is different.

LGBTQ+.title: Mapplethorpe
LGBTQ+.description: A portrait of the celebrated yet controversial photographer Robert Mapplethorpe whose relationship with Patti Smith and other icons of the '70s New York influenced his photographs.

LGBTQ+.title: Midnight Kiss
LGBTQ+.description: A group of gay best friends and their gal pal head to a desert home to celebrate New Year’s Eve. But when a sadistic killer wants in on the party, relationships are tested and secrets are exposed as the night turns into a fight for survival.

LGBTQ+.title: Naz & Maalik
LGBTQ+.description: Two closeted teens from Bed-Stuy unwittingly find themselves in the crosshairs of the War on Terror when surveillance footage of their secretive behavior is wildly misinterpreted in this smart indie comedy.

LGBTQ+.title: Princess Cyd
LGBTQ+.description: Eager to escape life with her single father, 16-year-old athlete Cyd visits her novelist aunt in Chicago over the summer. There, she falls for a girl in the neighborhood, while she and her aunt gently challenge each other in the realms of sex and spirit.

LGBTQ+.title: Tangerine
LGBTQ+.description: It's Christmas Eve in Tinseltown and Sin-Dee (newcomer Kitana Kiki Rodriguez) is back on the block. Upon hearing that her pimp boyfriend (James Ransone, STARLET, "Generation Kill") hasn't been faithful during the 28 days she was locked up, the working girl and her best friend, Alexandra (newcomer Mya Taylor), embark on a mission to get to the bottom of the scandalous rumor. Their rip-roaring odyssey leads them through various subcultures of Los Angeles, including an Armenian family dealing with their own repercussions of infidelity. Director Sean Baker’s prior films (STARLET, PRINCE OF BROADWAY) brought rich texture and intimate detail to worlds seldom seen on film. TANGERINE follows suit, bursting off the screen with energy and style. A decidedly modern Christmas tale told on the streets of L.A., TANGERINE defies expectation at every turn.

LGBTQ+.title: Those People
LGBTQ+.description: On Manhattan’s gilded Upper East Side, Charlie, a young painter, finds the man of his dreams in Tim, an older pianist from across the globe.

LGBTQ+.title: Tom of Finland
LGBTQ+.description: Finnish artist Touko Laaksonen becomes famous for his homoerotic works.

LGBTQ+.title: Transgender Nation
LGBTQ+.description: Gender identification is changing rapidly, causing heated division between the left and the right. Transgender Nation lifts the veil on the world of the Transgender and explore the secrets of a world most misunderstand.

LGBTQ+.title: A Very Sordid Wedding
LGBTQ+.description: Seventeen years after family matriarch Peggy tripped over G.W.’s wooden legs in Sordid Lives, same-sex marriage equality has barreled into Winters, Texas and not everyone is ready to accept it. An anniversary memorial service is being planned in honor of Peggy at the bar while the Southside Baptist Church plans an "Anti-Equality" rally to protest the abomination of gay marriage and work to defend their religious freedom. The beloved cast of colorful characters are all on a collision course for shenanigans and fireworks on the big night. Along the way a bisexual serial killer shows up, a drag queen country medley is performed and a beauty-salon-versus-the-bigots battle turns getting your hair done into the front lines of the equality battle.  Friendships are tested and families are reunited as fear and bigotry are confronted with acceptance and understanding on the way to a surprise wedding with (almost) everyone in attendance.

LGBTQ+.title: Vita & Virginia
LGBTQ+.description: The seductive true story of Virginia Woolf's love affair with socialite Vita Sackville-West, who inspired one of Woolf's greatest works of literature.

LGBTQ+.title: Where We Go from Here
LGBTQ+.description: Three acts of terror disrupt ordinary lives. A teacher dealing with domestic abuse finds even greater violence at school. Two lovers drifting apart may be separated by the hate of another. And, friends on a night out are caught up in brutal madness

Lifestyle & Culture.title: Ballet 422
Lifestyle & Culture.description: Filmmaker Jody Lee Lipes follows emerging choreographer Justin Peck as he undertakes the difficult tasks of creating and dancing in the New York City Ballet's 422nd original piece.

Lifestyle & Culture.title: Ballet Now
Lifestyle & Culture.description: Featuring New York City Ballet’s Prima Ballerina Tiler Peck - the first ever woman to be asked to curate The Music Center’s famed BalletNOW program - and a diverse cast of world-class dancers from around the globe, the film follows Tiler as she tries to execute her groundbreaking vision of mashing together the worlds of tap, hip-hop, ballet and even clown artistry. With less than a week to pull it all off, Tiler faces the mounting pressures of not only dancing in multiple pieces but also producing and directing this high profile event. The success of the performances rests squarely on her shoulders. Will she pull it off?

Lifestyle & Culture.title: The Gospel According to André
Lifestyle & Culture.description: This intimate portrait for André Leon Tally, a fixture in the world of fashion, takes viewers on a journey from André’s roots growing up to becoming one of the most influential tastemakers and fashion curators of our times.

Lifestyle & Culture.title: Iris (2014)
Lifestyle & Culture.description: From legendary documentarian Albert Maysles (GREY GARDENS, GIMME SHELTER), IRIS pairs the late 88-year-old filmmaker with Iris Apfel, the quick-witted, flamboyantly dressed 93-year-old style maven who has had an outsized presence on the New York fashion scene for decades. More than a fashion film, the documentary is a story about creativity and how a soaring free spirit continues to inspire.

Lifestyle & Culture.title: Larger Than Life: The Kevyn Aucoin Story
Lifestyle & Culture.description: A pioneer of contour techniques, makeup artist Kevyn Aucoin’s meteoric rise to fame in the 80’s and 90’s was legendary. Iconic clients, friends, and family retrace his life, career, and mysterious death at the height of his fame in 2002.

Music.title: After the Screaming Stops
Music.description: A raw and emotional look into the aftermath of fame and the reconnection between two twins torn apart by their past.

Music.title: Amazing Grace
Music.description: A documentary presenting the live recording of Aretha Franklin's album Amazing Grace at The New Temple Missionary Baptist Church in Watts, Los Angeles in January 1972.

Music.title: Amy Winehouse: A Final Goodbye
Music.description: A Final Goodbye is an intimate look into the life and times of Amy Winehouse from her rise to pop superstardom through to the inner demons that inspired her work and eventually caused her untimely death.

Music.title: Bad Reputation
Music.description: The life and career of Joan Jett from her early years ripping it up onstage as the founder and backbone of hard-rock legends The Runaways, to her solo career and the enduring presence as a rock 'n' roll pioneer and mentor.

Music.title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
Music.description: In 1962 four young men John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison and Ringo Starr came together to form the 20th century musical phenomenon known as, "The Beatles."  The band stormed Europe in 1963, and, in 1964, they conquered America.

Music.title: Big Voice
Music.description: A year in the life of a demanding high school choir teacher who pushes his students to become “one big voice” in this inspiring musical documentary.

Music.title: Bolden
Music.description: BOLDEN imagines the compelling, powerful and tragic journey of Buddy Bolden, the unsung American hero who invented Jazz.

Music.title: Cherry Pop
Music.description: Cherry Pop, directed by Assaad Yacoub, follows one wild, crazy night at a drag club. The matriarch of the show Zaza refuses to come out of her dressing room, while a young newcomer, The Cherry, is tormented by the regular troupe of back-stabbing queens.

Music.title: The Duchess of Langeais
Music.description: Antoinette (Balibara) is the Duchess, a married coquette who frequents the most extravagant balls in 1820's Paris during The Restoration. Hypocrisy and vanity reign. Handsome general Armand de Montriveau (Guillaume Depardieu) feels true love upon first meeting the Duchess. Flattered, the alluring Antoinette orchestrates a calculated game of seduction, but repeatedly refuses the general. Despite his sincere romantic declarations, Montriveau's passion remains unfulfilled. When he eventually seeks revenge, Antoinette's love awakens. But it may well be too late for the star-crossed lovers.

Music.title: Earth Girls Are Easy
Music.description: Three furry, colorful aliens crash-land in L.A. and are introduced to American pop culture by a ditsy manicurist.

Music.title: Forever My Girl
Music.description: A country music super-star returns to his hometown after leaving his love behind 8 years ago.

Music.title: Fun in Acapulco
Music.description: Fun In Acapulco portrays Elvis as a sexy lifeguard by day who transforms himself into a popular entertainer at night by singing at a local Mexican resort.

Music.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
Music.description: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

Music.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!
Music.description: Fishing boat captain, popular with the ladies, sings at night to earn enough to buy his own boat.

Music.title: The Gospel According to André
Music.description: This intimate portrait for André Leon Tally, a fixture in the world of fashion, takes viewers on a journey from André’s roots growing up to becoming one of the most influential tastemakers and fashion curators of our times.

Music.title: Grace Jones: Bloodlight and Bami
Music.description: A larger-than-life entertainer, an androgynous glam-pop diva – Grace Jones is all these things and more. Sophie Fiennes’s documentary goes beyond the traditional music biography, offering a portrait as stylish and unconventional as its subject.

Music.title: Grace Unplugged
Music.description: Having just turned 18, Grace Trey (AJ Michalka) aspires to more than just singing at her church, where the worship leader is her father (James Denton), a former pop star.

Music.title: Hearts Beat Loud
Music.description: In Red Hook, Brooklyn, a father and daughter become an unlikely songwriting duo in the last summer before she leaves for college.

Music.title: High Strung
Music.description: When a Midwest dancer and a street-wise British musician meet in New York, they immediately clash but there’s an undeniable attraction as well. The two must navigate their differences for a competition that will change their lives forever.

Music.title: I Can Only Imagine
Music.description: The inspiring true story behind Christian band MercyMe's beloved, chart topping song that brings ultimate hope to so many with the power of true love and forgiveness.

Music.title: Joe Strummer: The Future Is Unwritten
Music.description: Julien Temple's electrifying Sundance rock-doc is about The Clash's Joe Strummer, the punk icon whose message has inspired Bono, Johnny Depp, John Cusack and more.

Music.title: Kiki
Music.description: 25 years after 'Paris Is Burning' introduced the art of voguing to the world, Kiki revisits New York City's thriving underground ballroom scene. It's a larger-than-life world in which LGBTQ youths of color are empowered by staging elaborate dance competitions that showcase their dynamic choreography, fabulous costumes, and fierce attitude. It's also a safe haven for struggling, at-risk teens who find acceptance, support, and friendship within the Kiki community. Granted intimate access to the scene, filmmaker Sara Jordenö introduces viewers to some of Kiki culture's most prominent personalities, going beyond the glamour of the balls to highlight the serious challenges facing queer black and Latino young people. Bringing together heartrending personal stories with incredible displays of creative expression, Kiki is 'exhilarating…an indelible, must-see ode to gay New York' (Manohla Dargis, The New York Times).

Music.title: Lords of Chaos
Music.description: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

Music.title: Love & Mercy
Music.description: John Cusack and Paul Dano star as Beach Boys genius Brian Wilson in this film that intimately examines the unique journey and ultimate salvation of the musical icon.

Music.title: Low Down
Music.description: Jazz pianist Joe Albany (John Hawkes) and his daughter Amy-Jo (Elle Fanning) battle insurmountable odds in seedy 1970s Los Angeles in this compassionate and compelling story of the unwavering love between a father and a daughter.

Music.title: Michael Jackson: Life, Death and Legacy
Music.description: Following the recent imprisonment of Jackson's doctor Conrad Murray for involuntary manslaughter, we are taken on a journey through the extraordinary life of Michael Jackson from his debut in the Jackson 5 to his untimely death in 2009.

Music.title: Nico, 1988
Music.description: Nico, 1988 is the story of an artist, a mother, and the woman behind the icon. Approaching 50, Nico's life and career are on the ropes, a far cry from her glamorous days as a Warhol superstar and celebrated vocalist for The Velvet Underground.

Music.title: Nina
Music.description: Nina Simone (Zoe Saldana) was one of the century’s most extraordinary talents, but fame and fortune came with a price. Rediscovering the meaning of her life and work took courage, strength and one true friend: Clifton Henderson (David Oyelowo).

Music.title: The Phantom of the Opera
Music.description: Deep in the passageways below the Paris Opera lives a lonely, talented, horribly disfigured man who revels in terrorizing the theater's employees as The Phantom of the Opera.

Music.title: The Quiet One
Music.description: He was the bassist for The Rolling Stones and known as the "quiet one." Now, Bill Wyman speaks out about life in the world’s greatest rock band through a tour of his personal archive.

Music.title: Ricochet
Music.description: Two homicide detectives find their careers – and lives – on the line when they get caught up in a case of murder and betrayal in high-society Savannah.

Music.title: Seymour: An Introduction
Music.description: Meet Seymour Bernstein: a virtuoso pianist, veteran New Yorker, and true original who gave up a successful concert career to teach music.

Music.title: Shut Up and Play the Hits
Music.description: LCD final show at MSG: frontman James Murphy had made the conscious decision to disband one of the most celebrated and influential bands of its generation at the peak of its popularity, ensuring that the band would go out on top.

Music.title: Soul Boys of the Western World
Music.description: Relive the music, fashion, and spirit of the 80s via the incredible, behind-the-scenes saga of the rise, fall, and comeback of chart-topping New Wave legends Spandau Ballet.

Music.title: Teen Spirit
Music.description: Violet (Elle Fanning) is a shy teenager who dreams of escaping her small town and pursuing her passion to sing. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her integrity, talent and ambition.

Music.title: Vox Lux
Music.description: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star (Natalie Portman).

Music.title: Wayne's World 2
Music.description: Wayne and Garth try to organize a marathon rock concert called Waynestock.

Music.title: Whitney
Music.description: From Oscar®-winning filmmaker Kevin Macdonald comes an intimate, unflinching portrait of Whitney Houston and her family that probes beyond familiar tabloid headlines and sheds new light on the spellbinding trajectory of Houston’s life.

Music.title: Wild Rose
Music.description: WILD ROSE tells the complicated story of musician Rose-Lynn, a woman from Scotland who is on a quest to become a country music star, while also grappling with the responsibilities of being recently released from prison and a young mother.

Music.title: The Wrecking Crew
Music.description: Music lovers will be astonished at the influence The Wrecking Crew wielded over rock and pop music in the 1960s and early 1970s. These unsung instrumentalists were the de-facto backing band on hit records by The Beach Boys, Phil Spector, Frank Sinatra, Nancy Sinatra, Sonny & Cher, Elvis, The Monkees and many more. These dedicated musicians brought the flair and musicianship that made the American “West Coast Sound” a dominant cultural force around the world.

Mystery.description: Dylan Branson (Michiel Huisman) begins to notice the repetition of ominous events that happen at the same time every day. As he’s drawn into a complex relationship with Sarah (Teresa Palmer), Dylan must and take control of time itself.

Mystery.title: Angel of Mine
Mystery.description: In this intense thriller, Noomi Rapace stars as a woman on the edge who believes the daughter of a neighbor is actually her own.

Mystery.title: Annihilation
Mystery.description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition where the laws of nature don't apply.

Mystery.title: Cartels
Mystery.description: An elite team of DEA agents and a dangerous drug lord await extraction and find themselves trapped in an ambush!

Mystery.title: The Clovehitch Killer
Mystery.description: A picture-perfect family is shattered when the work of a serial killer hits too close to home. Dylan McDermott stars in this chilling portrait of all-American evil.

Mystery.title: The Cokeville Miracle
Mystery.description: Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.

Mystery.title: The Commuter
Mystery.description: A man who gets caught up in a criminal conspiracy during his daily commute home and works against the clock to stop a deadly attack to save the lives of his fellow train passengers.

Mystery.title: Cover Versions
Mystery.description: Four band members tell varying accounts of a night of sex, drugs, and murder before their first big show at a popular music festival.

Mystery.title: Deck the Halls
Mystery.description: Based on the first book in Mary Higgins Clark and daughter Carol Higgins Clark's novels, this story brings together two of the authors' most popular characters: Cleaning-woman-turned-private-eye Alvirah, and Detective Reilly.

Mystery.title: The Den
Mystery.description: After receiving a grant for her graduate thesis, Elizabeth Benton (Melanie Papalia) logs onto a video-chat site known as The Den, on a mission to explore the habits of its users.  During one of her random video-chats, Elizabeth watches in horror as a teenage girl is gruesomely murdered in front of her webcam. While the police dismiss it as a viral prank, Elizabeth believes what she saw is real and takes it upon herself to find the truth.  Her life quickly spirals out of control as she gets pulled deeper into the darkest recesses of the internet.  And eventually, Elizabeth finds herself trapped in a twisted game in which she and her loved ones are targeted for the same grisly fate as the first victim.

Mystery.title: Dept Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
Mystery.description: Police inspector Carl Morck and his assistant investigate a cold case involving a missing woman.

Mystery.title: Dept. Q: The Absent One
Mystery.description: The brutal, 20-year-old murder of a pair of twins is double the trouble for the detectives of Department Q in this gripping second installment in the blockbuster crime series.

Mystery.title: Digging for Fire
Mystery.description: The discovery of a bone and a rusty old gun send a husband and wife on separate adventures over the course of a weekend.

Mystery.title: The Disappointments Room
Mystery.description: A mother and her young son release unimaginable horrors from a hidden room in the attic of their rural dream home.

Mystery.title: Don't Go
Mystery.description: Between dreams and reality lies a terrifying hidden truth… A grieving father's nightmare holds the key to his daughter's death in this tantalizing psychological puzzle.

Mystery.title: The Fugitive
Mystery.description: Harrison Ford stars as a doctor accused of killing his wife who goes on the lam in search of the real culprit. Tommy Lee Jones co-stars.

Mystery.title: Gemini
Mystery.description: A heinous crime tests the complex relationship between a Hollywood starlet and her tenacious personal assistant. As the assistant unravels the mystery, she must confront her own understanding of friendship, truth and celebrity.

Mystery.title: Good Morning Killer
Mystery.description: This thriller stars Catherine Bell as FBI Special Agent Ana Gray, an undercover operative tracking down a serial kidnapper. As Ana develops a rapport with the kidnapper's latest victim, the suspect suddenly changes his pattern.

Mystery.title: Hide
Mystery.description: In this movie based on Lisa Gardner's book, Carla Gugino plays Boston Police Detective D.D. Warren, who is called to the grounds of an abandoned mental hospital where a buried chamber is discovered.

Mystery.title: Hollow in the Land
Mystery.description: When Alison's brother goes missing after being named the primary suspect in a trailer park murder, she must unearth the truth before her brother ends up behind bars or inside a casket. The harder she looks, the more people turn up dead.

Mystery.title: Hornet's Nest
Mystery.description: Robbie Amell, Michael Boatman and Michael Silver co-star in the first in this adaptation of the first novel in Cornwell's series of mysteries featuring reporter Andy Brazil, Police Chief Judy Hammer and her top deputy.

Mystery.title: I.T.
Mystery.description: Mike Regan (Pierce Brosnan) is a successful, self-made man. But he soon finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse when his I.T. consultant uses his skills to endanger Mike’s family, business and life.

Mystery.title: Killers Anonymous
Mystery.description: Tensions mount at KILLERS ANONYMOUS, a support group for killers, as the members of the group try to unravel a mystery: Which one of them is responsible for the assassination attempt on a U.S. senator that has the police in the city on high alert?

Mystery.title: Knives and Skin
Mystery.description: A small-town collapses into disarray after a teenage girl goes missing and her friends and their families become ensnared in a web of lies, suspicion, and depravity.

Mystery.title: The Landing
Mystery.description: A riveting investigation into the end of Apollo 18, the last US mission to the moon. Interviews conducted for the flight's 25th anniversary reveal new mysteries around the controversial tragedy that almost destroyed an American institution.

Mystery.title: The Limehouse Golem
Mystery.description: With the Limehouse Golem serial killer on the loose and taunting the police with messages written in blood, Inspector Kildare (Bill Nighy) must rely on help from a troubled witness (Olivia Cooke) to bring the killer to justice.

Mystery.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
Mystery.description: Michael "Mick" Haller, is a slick, charismatic Los Angeles criminal defense attorney who operates out of the back of his Lincoln Continental sedan.

Mystery.title: My Killer Client
Mystery.description: Christa Bright is an aspiring personal stylist who has an instant connection with new client Kat Niven, a shy woman who needs help gaining confidence.

Mystery.title: Narcopolis
Mystery.description: In a near future city where drugs are decriminalized, a cop investigating a murder learns that mass legalization can be deadly. Co-stars Jonathan Pryce (Game of Thrones).

Mystery.title: Odd Thomas
Mystery.description: Small-town fry cook Odd Thomas (Anton Yelchin) is an ordinary guy with a paranormal secret: he sees dead people, everywhere.

Mystery.title: The Other Man
Mystery.description: A taut thriller, The Other Man is an intimate tale of a man who discovers his wife's infidelity and sets out to track down his rival. Driven to pursue the mystery surrounding his wife’s adultery, Liam Neeson embarks on a global pursuit with a haunted passion that begins to probe the nature not simply of jealousy, but of loss and forgiveness. The film is beautifully shot on location in Milan and Lake Como as well as in London and Ely by renowned cinematographer Harris Zambarloukos (Mama Mia!, Heart in the Sand.)

Mystery.title: Out of Blue
Mystery.description: Patricia Clarkson is a New Orleans detective whose hunt for a killer draws her into a mystery of cosmic proportions in this tantalizing noir thriller.

Mystery.title: The Overnight
Mystery.description: Alex (Adam Scott), Emily (Taylor Schilling) and their son RJ are new to LA. A chance meeting introduces them to the mysterious Kurt (Jason Schwartzman), Charlotte and Max. A family "playdate" becomes increasingly interesting as the night goes on.

Mystery.title: Paranoid Park
Mystery.description: In this thriller from Gus Van Sant, a teen skater accidentally kills a security guard and slips into an inner world of mesmerizing paranoia.

Mystery.title: Phoenix Forgotten
Mystery.description: 20 years after three teenagers disappeared in the wake of mysterious lights appearing above Phoenix, Arizona, unseen footage from that night has been discovered, chronicling the final hours of their fateful expedition.

Mystery.title: Pi
Mystery.description: Max is a genius mathematician who built a supercomputer that provides the key for understanding all existence. Representatives from a Hasidic cabalistic sect and high-powered Wall Street firm hear of the secret and attempt to seduce him.

Mystery.title: Pray for Rain
Mystery.description: Young New York journalist, Emma Gardner, returns to the idyllic Central California farming community where she was raised to investigate the suspicious circumstances of her father's death even though it puts her in great danger.

Mystery.title: A Quiet Place
Mystery.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

Mystery.title: Silent Witness
Mystery.description: In SILENT WITNESS, Dermot Mulroney stars as a prominent defense attorney who returns to his small hometown to defend an old friend accused of murder. Also starring Anne Heche.

Mystery.title: A Simple Favor
Mystery.description: "A Simple Favor," directed by Paul Feig, centers around Stephanie (Anna Kendrick), a mommy vlogger who seeks to uncover the truth behind her best friend Emily's (Blake Lively) disappearance.

Mystery.title: Spinning Man
Mystery.description: When a 17-year old girl goes missing, family man and distinguished college professor, Evan Birch’s (Guy Pearce) life is turned upside down as circumstantial evidence convinces gruff police Detective Malloy (Pierce Brosnan) that Birch is a prime suspect. As Malloy begins to peel back the layers of Birch’s past indiscretions with female students, and his wife (Minnie Driver) begins to question his alibi, Birch’s life starts to unravel, and suddenly the questions that he’s faced with aren’t merely academic – they’re a matter of life and death.

Mystery.title: Suburbicon
Mystery.description: From director George Clooney, the small idyllic town of Suburbicon is the perfect place for Gardner Lodge (Academy Award  winner Matt Damon) to make a home. But beneath this tranquil surface lies a disturbing reality, where nothing is as it seems.

Mystery.title: Super 8
Mystery.description: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

Mystery.title: Unforgettable
Mystery.description: A forensics expert (Ray Liotta) is thrust into a heart-stopping adventure when he takes an experimental 'memory' drug in the hopes of discovering his wife's murderer.

Mystery.title: Veronica Mars
Mystery.description: On the eve of her law-school graduation, Veronica turns amateur sleuth once again after ex-boyfriend, Logan, becomes a murder suspect.

News.title: Divide and Conquer: The Story of Roger Ailes
News.description: The rise and fall of Roger Ailes, controversial Fox News mogul and Republican king-maker. One of the most powerful and divisive figures in media, Ailes would go down in flames amid scandal, paranoia, and multiple sexual harassment allegations.

News.title: The Reagan Show
News.description: Told solely through archival footage and set against the backdrop of the Cold War, The Reagan Show presents the pageantry, absurdity, and charisma of a prolific actor’s defining role: Leader of the Free World.

Romance.title: 35 and Ticking
Romance.description: Four friends are approaching the age of 35 and struggling to build families they've dreamed of. They try to rectify their romantic lives and futures while their biological clocks tick away.

Romance.title: 4 Lovers
Romance.description: In this sexy, French romantic drama, two couples decide to explore the boundaries of their relationships by swapping partners.

Romance.title: All About E
Romance.description: A sexy young DJ, E, and her gay best friend, Matt, are forced to run when E stumbles on some cash. But E finds she has burnt too many bridges and there is nowhere to run but outback Australia into the arms of the ex-girlfriend, Trish, who broke her heart.

Romance.title: Along for the Ride
Romance.description: Filmmaker Nick Ebeling profiles the professional exile and eventual re-emergence of Dennis Hopper following the making of "The Last Movie."

Romance.title: And So It Goes
Romance.description: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

Romance.title: Another Time
Romance.description: The top investment manager at his firm is assigned to help the stunning owner of a recently acquired company. He realizes he has fallen for her, and he has to go back in time to meet her before she becomes engaged.

Romance.title: AWOL
Romance.description: Joey joins the Army as a way out of Pennsylvania coal country just as she falls in love with magnetic housewife Rayna. A splendid meditation on the boundless possibilities of first love constricted by the trials of poverty.

Romance.title: Back to Christmas
Romance.description: Ali wakes realizing she's reliving a past Christmas allowing her to change the path of her love life with her ex or with someone entirely unexpected!

Romance.title: Bare
Romance.description: An innocent young girl in a small Nevada town falls in love with a female drifter who leads her into a life of stripping, drugs, and psychedelic spiritual experiences.

Romance.title: Barefoot
Romance.description: The "black sheep" son of a wealthy family meets a young psychiatric patient who's been raised in isolation her entire life. He takes the woman home for his brother's wedding to convince his family that he's changed his life.

Romance.title: Beyond Paradise
Romance.description: Shahrzad, a talented music student, flees Iran and agrees to marry a man in Los Angeles. Her new life is quickly threatened by a passionate relationship with her piano teacher's gardener.

Romance.title: The Big Wedding
Romance.description: To the amusement of their adult children and friends, long-divorced couple Don and Ellie Griffin (De Niro and Keaton) are once again forced to play the happy couple for the sake of their adopted son's wedding.

Romance.title: Billboard Dad
Romance.description: Two sisters (Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen) print a personals ad on a billboard to find a match for their newly single father.

Romance.title: Blind
Romance.description: A bestselling novelist (Alec Baldwin) loses his sight in a vicious car crash. Five years later, a Socialite (Demi Moore) is forced to read to the novelist as a plea bargain for her husband's insider trading. A passionate affair ensues.

Romance.title: The Blue Room
Romance.description: Two adulterous lovers go from pillow talk to possible murder in this sexy, brain-teasing thriller. Mathieu Amalric (The Diving Bell and the Butterfly, Grand Budapest Hotel) directs and stars as Julien, a middle-aged salesman embroiled in a steamy love affair with a married woman who, after a round of kinky sex, makes a startling suggestion. Suddenly Julien is caught up in a police investigation—but just what exactly happened? Based on a novel by celebrated crime writer Georges Simenon, this beguiling cinematic puzzle keeps the audience guessing every step of the way.

Romance.title: Book Club
Romance.description: Four friends' lives are turned upside down to hilarious ends when their book club tackles the infamous Fifty Shades of Grey.

Romance.title: The Boost
Romance.description: A real estate developer who enjoyed short-lived success seeks to regain his edge by using cocaine, but takes himself to new lows as he gets lost in the downward spiral of drug addiction.

Romance.title: Border
Romance.description: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveler while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence.

Romance.title: Breakup at a Wedding
Romance.description: A videographer captures an engaged couple's decision to proceed with a sham wedding after the bride calls off the ceremony and decides to break up with her partner, who secretly hopes that his surprise gift will ultimately change her mind.

Romance.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
Romance.description: Bridget Jones's Baby (2016) stars Renée Zellweger and Colin Firth. Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones (Renée Zellweger) must figure out which of the two men (Colin Firth, Patrick Dempsey) in her life is the father of her child.

Romance.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Romance.description: Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) begins keeping a diary that details her life as a single screwball and search for love in this hit comedy.

Romance.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
Romance.description: Beloved screwball Bridget Jones (Renee Zellweger) struggles to make love last in this sequel with Hugh Grant and Colin Firth.

Romance.title: Christmas Belle
Romance.description: It's "Beauty and the Beast" for Christmas when auctioneer Belle goes to catalog and finalize Hunter's estate sale. Hunter begins to soften as they work together, though, putting both the estate sale and Belle's heart in jeopardy.

Romance.title: The Christmas Calendar
Romance.description: When Emily, a small town baker, receives a Christmas Calendar from a secret admirer, it attracts the attention of the locals. With financial problems looming, the calendar turns out to be a Christmas miracle for Emily and the bakery.

Romance.title: A Christmas Kiss II
Romance.description: A passionate, mistletoe-instigated kiss in an elevator inspires a millionaire playboy and his sister’s relationship, gun-shy executive assistant to take a romantic leap of faith at Christmas.

Romance.title: Christmas Perfection
Romance.description: A woman magically wakes up in her perfect Christmas village in Ireland.

Romance.title: A Cinderella Christmas
Romance.description: The Christmasquerade Ball gives hardworking Angie a chance to let loose. She quickly charms Nicholas but has to go suddenly, leaving him only one clue to find her in this modern, holiday take on the classic fairytale.

Romance.title: The Cooler
Romance.description: A Las Vegas casino employee who is paid to pass his bad luck onto streaking gamblers goes on a roll thanks to a pretty cocktail waitress.

Romance.title: Crash Pad
Romance.description: A man thinks he has found true love with an older woman until he finds out she is married and using him to get revenge on her husband.

Romance.title: Cruise
Romance.description: Set in the 1980s, a young Italian-American from the "wrong side of the tracks" falls for a Jewish girl from Long Island.

Romance.title: Dog Days
Romance.description: Dog Days is a hilarious and heartfelt comedy that follows the lives of multiple dog owners and their beloved fluffy pals around Los Angeles. When these human and canines’ paths start to intertwine, their lives begin changing in ways they never expected.

Romance.title: A Dogwalker's Christmas Tale
Romance.description: Luce is a reluctant dog walker this Christmas, but as she makes friends at the local dog park, including Dean, a handsome dog walker, she must take sides when her boss announces plans to bulldoze the park in the new year to build a spa.

Romance.title: Drinking Buddies
Romance.description: Although they're both dating other people, two co-workers (Olivia Wilde, Jake Johnson) hang out together in bars and try to ignore their mutual attraction.

Romance.title: The Duchess of Langeais
Romance.description: Antoinette (Balibara) is the Duchess, a married coquette who frequents the most extravagant balls in 1820's Paris during The Restoration. Hypocrisy and vanity reign. Handsome general Armand de Montriveau (Guillaume Depardieu) feels true love upon first meeting the Duchess. Flattered, the alluring Antoinette orchestrates a calculated game of seduction, but repeatedly refuses the general. Despite his sincere romantic declarations, Montriveau's passion remains unfulfilled. When he eventually seeks revenge, Antoinette's love awakens. But it may well be too late for the star-crossed lovers.

Romance.title: Earth Girls Are Easy
Romance.description: Three furry, colorful aliens crash-land in L.A. and are introduced to American pop culture by a ditsy manicurist.

Romance.title: The Escort
Romance.description: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

Romance.title: Every Day
Romance.description: "Every Day" tells the story of Rhiannon, a 16-year old girl who falls in love with a mysterious spirit named "A" that inhabits a different body every day.

Romance.title: Faintheart
Romance.description: In this hilarious British romantic comedy, a geeky father obsessed with battle re-enactments suddenly must discover the true meaning of chivalry.

Romance.title: Fallen
Romance.description: Upon entering a mysterious reform school, Luce finds herself drawn into a love triangle and discovers her own love story that has been ongoing for centuries.

Romance.title: The Female Brain
Romance.description: What makes a woman swipe right for Mr. Wrong? Sofía Vergara and Whitney Cummings star in this fresh, witty look at the science behind our romantic missteps.

Romance.title: Finding Your Feet
Romance.description: On the eve of retirement, a middle-class snob discovers her husband has been having an affair, and is forced to live with her bohemian sister on an impoverished inner-city estate.

Romance.title: First Girl I Loved
Romance.description: In this Sundance award-winner, high-school misfit Anne falls in love with Sasha, the beautiful star of the softball team. When Anne tells her best friend Clifton about her new crush, his jealousy threatens more than just the girls' budding romance.

Romance.title: Forever My Girl
Romance.description: A country music super-star returns to his hometown after leaving his love behind 8 years ago.

Romance.title: Friends With Kids
Romance.description: In the wake of their friends' marriages and eventual offspring, longtime pals Julie (Jennifer Westfeldt) and Jason (Adam Scott) decide to have a child together without becoming a couple. By becoming "time-share" parents, they reason, they can experience the joys of parenthood without significantly curbing their personal freedom. However, when Julie and Jason both become involved with others, they discover that they secretly harbor romantic feelings for each other.

Romance.title: The Girl King
Romance.description: Sweden’s Queen Kristina, a flamboyant and unpredictable woman who ascended the throne at age six, was raised as a prince and strived to bring peace and education to her country—all while pursuing an illicit romance with her female royal attendant.

Romance.title: Girlfriends of Christmas Past
Romance.description: Expecting a proposal, Livvy gets dumped instead. She finds two more women her ex wronged and the trio decide on payback. Meanwhile, Livvy meets Carter and sparks begin to fly. Can she forget about revenge and let a Christmas romance bloom?

Romance.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
Romance.description: Sarah Jessica Parker, Helen Hunt and Shannen Doherty star in the outrageous '80s comedy hit that's totally packed with outrageous '80s fashions, music, dance moves, and more!

Romance.title: The Good Guy
Romance.description: The girlfriend of a hotshot Wall Street trader finds herself falling for his protege.

Romance.title: Goodbye First Love
Romance.description: Mia Hansen-Love returns with GOODBYE FIRST LOVE, an acutely perceptive portrait of a bright young woman in the wake of her first romance. Fifteen-year-old Camille (Lola Creton) is a serious girl who has fallen in love with the cheerful Sullivan (Sebastian Urzendowsky), an older boy who returns her feelings, mostly, but wants to be free to explore the world. When he leaves her to travel, she is devastated, but develops over the following years, into a more fully formed woman, with new interests and a new love - and the possibility that she'll be less defenseless when Sullivan enters her life again. Hansen-Love's follow up to the award-winning THE FATHER OF MY CHILDREN is filled with scenes that showcase her extraordinary ability to evoke moods and feelings. The story of a young woman's first romance is made into a singular experience, familiar in its broad strokes and yet so specific that it feels uniquely personal.

Romance.title: Half Magic
Romance.description: Three women use their newly formed sisterhood to fight against sexism, bad relationships and low self-esteem. Through embracing their wild adventures, they learn the secret to ultimate fulfillment.

Romance.title: Happy Accidents
Romance.description: A young woman finds love and happiness until her new boyfriend announces he is from the year 2470. Marisa Tomei and Vincent D'Onofrio star.

Romance.title: Heathers
Romance.description: Westerburg High School's elite clique of popular girls is "The Heathers," comprised of the powerful Heather Chandler, the green-with-envy Heather Duke, and the cowardly Heather McNamara. Rounding out the foursome is Veronica Sawyer (Winona Ryder), who is so fed up with the Heathers and the entire peer pressure cooker that she starts running with J.D. (Christian Slater), a mysterious - and possibly psychotic - motorcycle-riding newcomer. But what begins as their noble effort to rid Westerburg of its bad apples ends up taking a real toll. And their teen rebellion produces a serious and mounting body count. Shannen Doherty co-stars in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the '80s.

Romance.title: High Strung
Romance.description: When a Midwest dancer and a street-wise British musician meet in New York, they immediately clash but there’s an undeniable attraction as well. The two must navigate their differences for a competition that will change their lives forever.

Romance.title: Hitch
Romance.description: A New York man has a secret identity moonlighting as a dating doctor who specializes in planning dates for lovesick men.  He, himself, is adrift to the wonders of love until he meets and falls in love with a tabloid journalist who seeks his services in order to expose the doc as a scam artist, which jeopardizes uncovering his secret identity, until she finds out things about him as well as herself.

Romance.title: Holly's Holiday
Romance.description: Holly Maddux longs for a man like the mannequin in a nearby store. After she slips and hits her head, she wakes to a perfect gentleman by her side. Holly hits it off with her new man but must choose between the perfect life and real love.

Romance.title: The Housemaid
Romance.description: A forbidden passion awakens vengeful spirits within a haunted mansion in this bloodcurdling, erotic tour-de-force.

Romance.title: I'll Come Running
Romance.description: A young American woman finds herself drawn to a last-minute trip to Denmark, so that she can learn more about the man she loves.

Romance.title: If Beale Street Could Talk
Romance.description: Based on the novel by James Baldwin, "If Beale Street Could Talk" is a soulful drama about a young couple fighting for justice in the name of love and the promise of the American dream.

Romance.title: In a Relationship
Romance.description: Owen and Hallie have been together for years, but when Owen wavers on Hallie’s proposition to move in together, they make the rash decision to call it quits.

Romance.title: Ismael's Ghosts
Romance.description: Twenty-one years ago, she ran away. And twenty-one years later, Carlotta (Marion Cotillard) is back from the void. But Ismael (Mathieu Amalric) has been busy rebuilding his life with Sylvia (Charlotte Gainsbourg) and working on his next feature film.

Romance.title: Juliet, Naked
Romance.description: Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) develops an unlikely transatlantic romance with the once admired, now washed up, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

Romance.title: Leap Year
Romance.description: Amy Adams and Matthew Goode star in Leap Year, a romantic comedy that follows one woman’s determined quest to get married to the perfect guy…despite what fate has in store for her.

Romance.title: Leaving
Romance.description: Kristin Scott Thomas plays a married woman whose forbidden, adulterous affair with a handyman prompts her jealous husband to launch a revengeful campaign of blackmail.

Romance.title: Let the Sunshine In
Romance.description: Juliette Binoche and Gerard Depardieu star in this charming romantic comedy about a woman looking for love in all the wrong places.

Romance.title: Life Partners
Romance.description: A 29-year-old lawyer (Gillian Jacobs) and her lesbian best friend (Leighton Meester) experience a dramatic shift in their longtime bond after one enters a serious relationship.

Romance.title: Literally, Right Before Aaron
Romance.description: Adam (Justin Long) is definitely still in love with his ex (Cobie Smulders). So when he shows up at her wedding to prove that he's moved on, a series of funny and awkward encounters only confirms he's more in love with her than ever.

Romance.title: The Little Death
Romance.description: A game of sexual role-playing convinces a man that he wants to become a full-time actor, in one of several stories of suburbanites exploring erotic fetishes.

Romance.title: Liz in September
Romance.description: Every year, Liz, a hardcore party girl and womanizer, celebrates her birthday with her friends at a Caribbean beach retreat. This year is different.

Romance.title: Love After Love
Romance.description: Andie MacDowell shines as a mother exploring a new beginning while watching her sons' lives fall apart in this funny and inspiring drama.

Romance.title: The Lovers
Romance.description: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett.

Romance.title: The March Sisters at Christmas
Romance.description: A modern retelling of Louisa May Alcott's "Little Women" follows four sisters who learn their mother plans on selling their home after the holidays. In an effort to keep the family together, the sisters try to restore the house.

Romance.title: Marguerite & Julien
Romance.description: Forbidden passion blazes between a brother and sister in this feverishly sexy romance.

Romance.title: Married by Christmas
Romance.description: Carrie and Katie realize their family’s company will be inherited by the first sister to marry. With Katie’s Christmas Eve wedding already planned, workaholic Carrie sets out to elope before it’s too late.

Romance.title: Meet Joe Black
Romance.description: Brad Pitt and Anthony Hopkins give stellar performances in this film about a powerful man who receives a visit from Death and agrees to serve as his earthly guide in exchange for more time.

Romance.title: The Messenger
Romance.description: Will, an Iraq War veteran, struggles with his new post at the Casualty Notification Office. Under mentorship of fellow officer, Tony, the two men form a bond that will ultimately help them to readjust to "normal" life.

Romance.title: Middle of Nowhere
Romance.description: A restless troublemaking teenager falls for a tightly wound co-worker as they team up to earn big money and escape their families.

Romance.title: Moll Flanders
Romance.description: The unwavering hope and determination of a poverty-stricken young girl who goes from childhood in an orphanage to teen life on the street to eventually finding love with an unconventional artist.

Romance.title: The Monkey King 3
Romance.description: The Monkey King and his traveling companions must find a way to escape from the clutches of a queen who rules an all-female kingdom. They soon land in even deeper trouble when their shenanigans anger the mighty River God.

Romance.title: Monogamy
Romance.description: Brooklyn photographer Theo - miserable shooting weddings for a living - starts up a cool new business, taking surveillance-style photos of clients. But when an alluring female hires his services, the shutterbug falls into a world of lust and jealousy.

Romance.title: Morning Glory
Romance.description: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

Romance.title: Music From Another Room
Romance.description: A romantic comedy that follows the exploits of Danny, a young man who grew up believing he was destined to marry the girl he helped deliver as a five year old boy when his neighbor went into emergency labor.

Romance.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
Romance.description: A writer realizes that she is in love with her best friend and tries to stop him from marrying another woman, a guileless heiress.

Romance.title: My Santa
Romance.description: Single mother Jen dislikes the holidays, but she starts to rediscover the magic of Christmas after meeting a handsome mall Santa, Chris. Jen is unaware that Chris is actually the son of the real Santa, on a mission to find his Mrs. Claus.

Romance.title: The Myth of the American Sleepover
Romance.description: A gang of high-school students spend a decadent night full of sex, drugs and bad behavior.

Romance.title: Naughty & Nice
Romance.description: When a cynical Los Angeles DJ is exiled to a quaint mountain town for the holiday season, the small-town charm and holiday cheer—not to mention his pretty new co-host—begin to melt his icy demeanor.

Romance.title: No Strings Attached
Romance.description: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

Romance.title: Nobody's Fool
Romance.description: A woman is released from prison and reunites with her sister. She soon discovers that her sister is in an online relationship with a man who may not be what he seems.

Romance.title: Non-Fiction
Romance.description: Juliette Binoche and Guillame Canet star in this witty, seductive tale of sex, lies, and literature from acclaimed director Olivier Assayas (Personal Shopper, Carlos).

Romance.title: Once Upon a Time
Romance.description: Based on the best-selling fantasy novel Three Lives Three Worlds, Ten Miles of Peach Blossoms, ONCE UPON A TIME is a story of epic battles, deep passion, and the powerful forces that drive mortals and gods alike toward revenge, loyalty, and eternal love.

Romance.title: Overboard
Romance.description: A selfish, rich playboy, Leonardo, fires a hard-working single mother, Kate, hired to clean his yacht. After getting amnesia Kate convinces him he is her husband as payback and puts him to work.

Romance.title: The Phantom of the Opera
Romance.description: Deep in the passageways below the Paris Opera lives a lonely, talented, horribly disfigured man who revels in terrorizing the theater's employees as The Phantom of the Opera.

Romance.title: Playing It Cool
Romance.description: A young man meets and instantly falls in love with an engaged woman.

Romance.title: Plus One
Romance.description: Long-time friends Alice and Ben agree to be one another’s plus ones as they power through an endless parade of insufferable weddings.

Romance.title: The Pom Pom Girls
Romance.description: High-school seniors try to score on and off the field in this raunchy teen comedy set in the 1970’s.

Romance.title: Princess Cyd
Romance.description: Eager to escape life with her single father, 16-year-old athlete Cyd visits her novelist aunt in Chicago over the summer. There, she falls for a girl in the neighborhood, while she and her aunt gently challenge each other in the realms of sex and spirit.

Romance.title: The Princess of Montpensier
Romance.description: The life of a ravishing young princess is torn apart by lust and forbidden desire, in this epic period drama.

Romance.title: A Puppy for Christmas
Romance.description: All Noelle wants for Christmas is a puppy. But her furry friend is mischievous and gets them both evicted. Spending the holidays with her coworker, sparks begin to fly. When Noelle's ex shows up, she must decide which man she wants.

Romance.title: Rain
Romance.description: A chance encounter during a traffic jam, changes two people's lives forever in this gripping drama.

Romance.title: The Ramen Girl
Romance.description: An American girl abandoned by her boyfriend in Tokyo finds her calling in an unlikely place: a local ramen house. Run by a tyrannical chef who doesn't speak a word of English. Abby learns how to put passion and spirit into her life as well as her cooking.

Romance.title: Results
Romance.description: Personal trainers (Cobie Smulders and Guy Pearce) are tasked with getting a newly wealthy and highly unmotivated client (Kevin Corrigan) into shape in this smart and funny comedy about love and fitness.

Romance.title: Rodeo & Juliet
Romance.description: A city girl is forced to go to the country where she meets a special horse and a young cowboy who teaaches her to barrel race while her mother reconnects with her former fiancé.

Romance.title: The Romantics
Romance.description: Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.

Romance.title: Romeo and Juliet
Romance.description: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

Romance.title: Rosy
Romance.description: A socially awkward man kidnaps an aspiring actress so she can get to know him, but he soon gets much more than he bargained for.

Romance.title: Say Anything...
Romance.description: John Cusack stars as an aimless high-school graduate who tries to win the hand of the class brain in this teen classic.

Romance.title: Second Chance Christmas
Romance.description: A woman’s husband uses her memory loss as a chance to make her fall in love with him again at Christmas.

Romance.title: Serena
Romance.description: In Depression-era North Carolina, the barren wife (Jennifer Lawrence) of an ambitious timber baron (Bradley Cooper) sets out to murder the woman who bore her husband an illegitimate son.

Romance.title: Sidewalls
Romance.description: Martin and Mariana are destined for one another; they're passionate about the same subjects, love the same movies and enjoy the same hobbies—only they have yet to meet.

Romance.title: So This Is Christmas
Romance.description: Eighteen-year-old Ashley's life is headed in the wrong direction. She's been hanging out with a bad crowd and seeking an escape from the drama at home.

Romance.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
Romance.description: A young tomboy, Watts (Mary Stuart Masterson), discovers that her feelings for her best friend, Keith (Eric Stoltz), run deeper than just friendship when he gets a date with Amanda (Lea Thompson), the most popular girl in school. Amanda's ex, Hardy (Craig Scheffer), who is from the rich section of town, is unable to let go of her, and plans to get back at Keith.

Romance.title: The Spirit of Christmas
Romance.description: Kate is sent to broker the sale of Hollygrove Inn where she discovers Daniel and agrees to help him solve the mystery of his murder to help him move on, but she didn’t plan on falling in love along the way.

Romance.title: Stella's Last Weekend
Romance.description: Brothers Jack (Nat Wolff) and Oliver (Alex Wolff) reunite to put their beloved dog to sleep. While their zany mother plans a party to celebrate Stella’s life, things go hilariously awry when the brothers discover they love the same girl.

Romance.title: The Sweet Life
Romance.description: The classic story of “Boy Meets Girl” … until Girl convinces Boy to drive to San Francisco with her … so they can throw themselves off the Golden Gate Bridge.  Only they fall in love along the way.

Romance.title: Those People
Romance.description: On Manhattan’s gilded Upper East Side, Charlie, a young painter, finds the man of his dreams in Tim, an older pianist from across the globe.

Romance.title: Time Freak
Romance.description: Physics prodigy Stillman (Asa Butterfield) is destined for great things, only to be derailed when his girlfriend, Debbie (Sophie Turner) suddenly dumps him.

Romance.title: The Tomorrow Man
Romance.description: Ed spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie spends her life shopping for things she may never use. In a small town somewhere in America, they try to find love while trying not to get lost in each other's stuff.

Romance.title: Touched With Fire
Romance.description: From Executive Producer Spike Lee. Katie Holmes and Luke Kirby star as bipolar poets who begin a romance that puts their hearts (and minds) to the ultimate test.

Romance.title: The Truth About Christmas
Romance.description: An encounter with a Santa results in a drastic change.

Romance.title: Two Family House
Romance.description: Blue-collar Italian-American Buddy Visalo (Michael Rispoli) has a record of failed business ventures. After buying a rundown home, his new scheme is to transform the bottom floor into a neighborhood bar.

Romance.title: Under the Tuscan Sun
Romance.description: A recently divorced San Francisco writer impulsively buys a villa during a trip to Italy and embarks on a life-changing adventure.

Romance.title: Up in the Air
Romance.description: Ryan Bingham  is living the high life. Flying all over the world on business, he never stops moving...until he meets Alex, a fellow passenger and learns that life isn't about the journey, but the connections made along the way.

Romance.title: Vincere
Romance.description: In this provocative, erotic romance, Benito Mussolini's feisty mistress will stop at nothing to be in the arms of her powerful lover.

Romance.title: Vita & Virginia
Romance.description: The seductive true story of Virginia Woolf's love affair with socialite Vita Sackville-West, who inspired one of Woolf's greatest works of literature.

Romance.title: Waiting to Exhale
Romance.description: Four successful African-American women endure the ups and downs of modern love in this witty, often hilarious film based on the best-selling novel by Terry McMillan.

Romance.title: What Men Want
Romance.description: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear their thoughts.

Romance.title: When Harry Met Sally
